product_title: Maleficent (Plus Bonus Features)
review_headline: A unique new twist on a classic tale.
review_body:
In Maleficent, a vengeful fairy (Jolie) is driven to curse an infant princess, only to discover that the child may be the one person who can restore peace to their troubled land.

It is not often you can completely retell a classic fairy tale such as sleeping beauty and still have something that satisfies in both an old and new way. Maleficent is done in such a way that is unique but still at the same time familiar. Disney does a great job at retelling the story and giving us something more but still in a classic Disney way.

The special effect are amazing and some of the best I have seen in a while but done in such a way, I almost feel I am watching an old classic Disney tale from many years ago.

Jolie does a great job in her role and the evil fairy godmother and her costume and makeup are great as well, making her even more believable in the role.

Overall, an enjoyable film that brings a new twist to an old tale. 4 stars.

product_title: Black Widow
review_body: I discovered In This Moment after seeing them at the 2010 Mayhem Fest. My favorite aspect about the band is that they have always experimented with different sound with each record. I enjoyed Blood, their foray into industrial hard rock, but didn't think it was quite as strong as their previous works after multiple listens. When the popularity of the band soared, and they announced that with Blood they had \\\\\found their sound,\\\\\" I got apprehensive that they would stop experimenting, and just repeat the same album again.    Thankfully, Black Widow is mostly more ambitious and confident experimentation with the \\\\\"Blood sound.\\\\\" Sadly there are some experiments on this album that should have never escaped the laboratory.    The album opens with the abomination that is \\\\\"Sex Metal Barbie,\\\\\" the bands' failed attempt to make a \\\\\"silence the haters\\\\\" track. It is a redundant subject matter, since they already released the better song \\\\\"Whore\\\\\" on their previous album, not to mention Black Widow has two tracks, \\\\\"The Fighter\\\\\" and \\\\\"Natural Born Sinner,\\\\\" which deal with similar subjects. If you want to silence the haters, having a bunch of (presumably) thirty year olds make a rap rock influenced \\\\\"song\\\\\" that sounds like a tween wanksta wrote it is not the way to do it. The song is the worst thing this band has ever produced.    \\\\\"Big Bad Wolf\\\\\" does not fare better, all the vocal layering and instrumentals clash into a headache inducing cacophony during the chorus. I found Maria yelling \\\\\"Pig! Pig!\\\\\" (which sounds like \\\\\"Peh! Peh!\\\\\") about a hundred times too many to be very obnoxious. This is from a band where I enjoy the lead vocalist screeching like a banshee (example = \\\\\"The Gun Show\\\\\") it takes a lot for these guys to annoy me.    Mercifully, most of the tracks fare better:    Dirty Pretty - A Golden Age of Grotesque Marilyn Manson era sounding rock song mixed with a soaring ITM chorus. Very catchy and has been stuck in my head a lot since I first heard it. 5/5    Black Widow - I don't actually mind all the filtered robot vocals on this track because it sounds right at home with this dance floor ready Rob Zombie-ish bouncing industrial track. The ultimate earworm on this album. 5/5    Sexual Hallucination - I was expecting a groan-worthy song, but surprisingly this is really solid, it sounds like something off of \\\\\"The Dream,\\\\\" and the vocal performance by Brink and Brent Smith actually sells me on its silly subject matter. It's a surprise, since I usually find duets cheesy. 4/5    Sick Like Me - Hey look! The non-Maria Brinks get to build up a song! I love the guitar heavy intro (which this album could use more of) and the overall song. Sounds like a more confident \\\\\"Blood\\\\\" track. 5/5    Bloody Creature Poster Girl - This literally sounds like an old school musical mixed with crunching ITM rock. It's ballsy and one of the highlights of the album. 5/5    The Fighter - Oh. Yes. This is ITM ballad goodness. Shows off the powerhouse Brink's vocals can be. It's up there with \\\\\"The Dream\\\\\" and \\\\\"World in Flames\\\\\" as one of my favorite ballads from them. 10/5    Bones - A great song that switches from trippy 90's alternative rock to an epic chorus. One of the stronger, catchier songs. 5/5    Natural Born Sinner - Maria Brink's anthem for sticking up for her...sexuality? Or religious bigots who judge her? Not really sure, lyrics are kind of annoyingly vague. But the chorus is pretty fun to yell along to. 4/5    Into the Darkness - This interlude would have us believe that some negative voice of decent insults Maria Brink into crying for a minute and some change, then she is inspired to sing \\\\\"Out of Hell.\\\\\" I get that the band is attempting to do more theatrical stuff, but this is just flat out pretentious. 0/5    Out of Hell - This could have been a decent \\\\\"save the troubled youth\\\\\" ballad, but some of the lyrics are heavy handed and layered with more cheese by adding sound effects such as police sirens, yelling and the like to hammer in the tragedy. This would havebeen a great song if it was stripped down. 2/5    The running flaw of Black Widow for me is that there is way too much voice filters and vocal chopping throughout for my tastes. There was tolerable amounts of this on the \\\\\"Blood\\\\\" album but, but here it is oversaturated. I like Maria Brink's vocals like I like my sushi, raw. Sadly, her voice is chopped and filtered through a lot of the album, which prevents me from liking this music as much as I should.    A lot of older fans have been complaining that the current image of ITM musically is simply to hoist Maria Brink on a pedestal and promoting her sexiness. Lyrically there is nothing on this album to detract from those critics, as the album contains two main song subjects: Maria Brink is sexy/likes sex/is mind-blowing at sex (tracks 5, 6 and 8) and \\\\\"I'm Maria Brink, I'm awesome, and I will fight the haters\\\\\" anthems (tracks 2, 4, 9, and 11). I don't have a problem overall with their more theatrical image/music/live show, and can have fun with it, I just don't find it as personal and enjoyable as their previous work.    People on the Blood Legion bandwagon who started listening to In This Moment with Blood will probably have no issue with this album. Fans of the first three albums probably should proceed with caution. Despite all the criticisms I have with Black Widow, I enjoy most of the music experimentation on this album, though some of these songs should have been sent back to the drawing board."

product_title: Stoner (New York Review Books Classics)
review_headline: I am better for knowing Stoner
review_body: One of the best  Don't know how I missed it when it first came out.  So glad I saw Steve Almond's article about the book in the NYTimes Magazine (May 14th I think) section last spring.  Writing was great  such a natrural flow of thought and circumstance.  I felt a friendship with Stoner and a great desire to see him happy.  I think it was Almond who said we are all Stoner.  Stoner was an individual with exceptional trials of life but he was also Everyman.  Most importantly for the reader, Stoner's life , work, family, friendships, failures, loves etc were just like all of us experience and which we love reading about..... at least I do.

product_title: Top Gun (Two-Disc Combo: Blu-ray 3D / Blu-ray / Digital Copy)
review_body: Excellent movie to watch with surround sound!  Most people are giving a review of the movie itself but this is a review of the 3d Blu Ray.  Great in 3d even though not filmed in 3d.  I love Top Gun so for me, 5 stars!  3 stars given because I find this copy of the movie so grainy.  People say that grain is added for the theater effect.  I don't ever remember a theater being this grainy.  I think it really detracts from the HD experience not having it clear and crisp when in 3d.  My Samsung TV will convert a normal movie to 3d and does a decent job of it.  For me, I think I'd rather watch the normal Top Gun 2d Blu Ray and let my TV convert it to 3d so it maintains the crisp clarity. This is only my second 3d movie, my other (Man of Steel)  is just as grainy.  reading more about these movies,  this is actually done on purpose.  Annoying I think!

product_title: Proof of Heaven: A Neurosurgeon's Journey into the Afterlife
review_body: Dr. Eben Alexander, M.D. certainly has impressive credentials as a neurosurgeon to write about his experiences, especially since previous to his Near Death Experience (NDE), he was a skeptic about God and an afterlife. Not only is his recovery from his rare illness extraordinary, but so was his NDE, since the part of his brain that experiences thought and emotion was dead. Some have criticized his book as being too "new age-ish," but I think had he professed one religious belief his audience would have been smaller and he would have had to have gone with a religious publisher. Instead, Simon and Schuster picked the book up, and my version even had a reader's guide, and the book became a New York Times Bestseller. The author does identify as a Christian who worships in a church centering around Jesus, but his book's main message is essentially one that says there is a life after this one, there is a creator who loves and knows each one of us, and science does not have all the answers about consciousness. This book which relates an undeniable experience will comfort many and potentially change lives.

product_title: Cloud Atlas: A Novel
review_headline: Multiple storylines are hit or miss
review_body:
Cloud Atlas is a unique and ambitious novel. It seeks to connect six very different story lines, each written in their own style. The stories take place in different times and are loosely connected.
I found half of the stories to be captivating page-turners while the others fell flat by comparison. The transition from one story to another is often jarring (intentionally at one point but seemingly unintentional at others) which made it difficult to really get wrapped up into the narrative. It felt as if just as I was starting to get into the new characters and plot it would suddenly stop and switch to the next one. Sometimes the new story felt boring in comparison to the previous one which I enjoyed much more, but this would be a personal gripe since I know some people will prefer different story arcs than I did based on their tastes. This is the crux of the problem with Cloud Atlas. By including such a variety of plots and writing style it can be difficult to enjoy every part of the book unless you happen to enjoy the particular parts included (I for one did not enjoy the murder mystery segment)

I would recommend giving this book a chance if you are interested in reading a novel with unique structure and style, although I personally thought it could have been done much more smoothly.

product_title: Fifty Shades Freed: Book Three of the Fifty Shades Trilogy (Fifty Shades of Grey Series) (English Edition)
review_headline: Best of James's three books -- still redundant writing style
review_body: Still plagued with the redundancies that E.L. James writing tends to have, but at least in this third book of her trilogy, she's improved "some" as a writer.  Redundant style includes the overuse of so many phrases. She has her characters Christian Grey and Ana Steele employ a thesaurus to outsmart one another yet James didn't reach for one in her own writing.  That's unfortunate. She did improve on making this third book more action packed with a clear antagonist from the get-go and more drama. Of all her books, this one is the page turner.  But of course, the sex is well overdone but that's what perhaps makes the book popular.

product_title: Finding Pride (Pride Series Romance Novels Book 1)
review_body:
This is the story of Megan. Her brother has just died, she's divorced and needing a place to reinvent herself. She decides to stay at her brother's place after finding out he had plans to include her in his business. Instead she partners with her brother's best friend, Todd Jordan and his brother and sister.

Megan is a strong young woman but I didn't enjoy Todd's character I thought he seemed to much like the ex-husband. A little fast at the end but otherwise a good story.

review_body: KINO is the masters that bring cinema to Blu-ray. There line of silent films on blu-ray is amazing and utterly flooring at the art form and craftmanship they put into there products. Cabinet of Dr. Caligari is one of those very important films that is one of my top films of all time. This is the film to own for it's old school mastery at telling a story both vivid and with a dark reality and presentation. Perfection in performing and leaving you ready for more twisted, nightmarish images. The special features are awesome and the transfer of this film is mastery at it finest. Never has this film been such clarity. They honored this film. KINO tends to always create mastery. Highly recommend for the quality given to this transfer and to the reality. Cabinet of Dr. Caligari is a film that goes up there with silent perfection. It's different and it's unique and is something that stands out. I absolutely loved this and KINO's transfer of this film is amazing. www.abucketofcorn.com

product_title: MY CONVERSATION WITH THE UNIVERSE: A One-On-One Conversation with the New Age God
review_body:
Darrin Mason is on a spiritual path, and that path led him to write "My Conversation with the Universe," a book about one human's interaction with the divine. No matter what your religious or spiritual beliefs, this book will enhance them.

Mason reports on his conversations with the infinite mind in a personalized way that reads like a mystery story unfolding. "MY CONVERSATION WITH THE UNIVERSE - A ONE-ON-ONE CONVERSATION WITH THE NEW AGE GOD"is precisely what it says: Mason reports on an exciting and personal adventure with the universal.

Download this "highly recommended" spiritual conversation between award-winning magazine cartoonist Darrin Mason and the the universe, and enjoy the gifts that a higher mind can bring.

product_title: Paper Towns
review_headline: Another great story by John Green
review_body: Well written story with very well developed characters. I picked up this book because I wanted to read it before I saw the movie. The story really drew me in! Quentin (Q) is a likable, awkward guy who has carried a crush on his neighbor and childhood friend, Margo. As sometimes happens, the two had grown apart, Margo becoming quite popular and Q admiring her from the sidelines. All this changes one night when Margo appears at his window, looking for help and later disappears. The book centers on the mystery of what happened to Margo and Q trying to follow the clues to find her. A fun, thought provoking read!

product_title: Carter's Baby Boys' 1 Pc Cotton 321g196
review_headline: The nine month versions are much more stretchy and easy to get legs and feet in and out
review_body: All of the Carters 12 month pajamas seem to have very narrow legs and feet.  The nine month versions are much more stretchy and easy to get legs and feet in and out, but now that we are outgrowing that size we ordered these. We ordered the whale version, fire truck, race cars , monster, &red with a little raccoon on a scooter.  The whales & Fire truck are the best out of all of those - a bit more space for chubby baby thighs.  The fabric seems a bit softer too. Still not as soft as our 9month ones but better than others.   Update - they have gotten much better with use.  Feet and leg sections seem to have stretched a bit and fabric is softer after a few washes.  We ordered the dump truck version too.

product_title: 90 Degree By Reflex – High Waist Tummy Control Shapewear – Power Flex Capri
review_headline: Absolutely 5-Stars!  The Product Description Says It All.
review_body: I almost never 'gush' about a product, but these capris deserve a little more enthusiasm.  I absolute love everything about them.  The Product Description says it all!  First of all, I normally wear an XL in just about everything, but the Large size in these capris fit perfectly (nothing bad about that!).  Secondly, the pants I received (Watermelon) are made from high quality fabric with some 'weight' to it, and the workmanship is A+.  Maybe most importantly (for me) is these pants really are 'High Rise' (yea!!).  I feel totally comfortable going out to a yoga class with no worries about accidentally showing butt-cracks or belly flops.  They actually make me look slimmer because they hold everything in the right place - no more muffin tops!  From now on, these are my ‘go to’ yoga pants.  I’ll buy a couple more pair for variety.  By the way, the product description mentions that the colors of the 'Watermelon' and 'Pop Orange' are more vibrant than what you see in the photos.  With respect to the Watermelon, WOW, they are not kidding.  I can’t imagine Pink getting any ‘hotter’.  Love it!  Thanks to ’90 Degree’ for actually delivering the pants as advertised.

product_title: Karen Neuburger Women's 47 Inch Long Sleeved Brocade Robe In Silver Grey
review_headline: Wonderfully Soft and a Perfect Fit
review_body:
I bought this lounging garment, as I call it, for my 90 year old mother who previously was content to wear a flimsy cotton robe around the home over her night wear. She would then need another one or two sweaters under the garment to keep warm. This robe is warm yet lightweight so she can just wear this alone over her nightgowns or pajamas or even during the day over casual wear if necessary and it remains very comfortable and attractive.

It is a beautifully designed robe. It is very light grey, (silver), with a lovely silvery white brocade design. I ordered her a medium as she wears a size 8 and it is slightly large, but allows her to add an extra sweater when necessary. I find it so important as you age to continue to keep up appearance and feel good about the way you look. This way if we have family over and she does not want to get all "fancied up" she still looks appropriately attired with a fresh nightgown and this exquisite cover-up. I could not be more pleased with the fit and the overall appearance and neither could she.

ADDITION: I forgot to mention the two medium sized, satiny pockets that sit at hip's length on either side.

product_title: Halloween Costumes Animal Onesie Adults Sleeping Wear Kigurumi Pajamas Cosplay
review_body:
*This was written by a 10 year old at 10:51.

I love this coustume. It is really fuzzy, cute, and well made. I got the cheese cat color in a small size, and it fit me perfectly (I'm about 4'11 or so). The tail hangs a little below my rear, but it looks like a tail nonetheless. The stripes all appear to be sewn on, however, one of the stripes is coming a bit lose. Either way, I suspect it will last. We have never machine washed this thing at home yet, though it will probably survive many washes to come. The product arrived MUCH earlier than expected. The only reason I'm giving this four stars is because when we received the package, the product came with a weird smell. But it was nothing that a little surface washing couldn't fix. I'm not sure if the product was made with a funny smell or of it just rode here in a stinky ups truck, but either way, it needed to be washed before it was worn. Also another thing you should be somewhat careful of is the tail. Sometimes if you sit on the tail it would feel kind of weird underneath you. However, it isn't that bad.
So, overall, this is a good product for a cheap price, and I would recommend it.

product_title: California Costumes Women's Lethal Beauty Costume
review_body: I usually sew/assemble my own costumes because I think store bought costume kits are overpriced for the quality, but this Halloween I just didn't have the time, so I bought this based on other reviews and I have to say I am very impressed, especially for the price (about $35). I've bought costumes before for twice the price that look nothing like the picture on the package, are poorly sewn to the point of being unwearable, and are made of materials that are uncomfortable and seem like they'll fall apart the first time you wear it. Not the case with this costume. It is almost exactly as pictured, with the exception that the tights are a transparent beige, as other commenters have noted. All of the seams are sewn very well and the materials are comfortable and of decent quality. I had to tug the boot covers pretty hard to get them over my boots (size 8), but I was never concerned that they were going to tear and they fit perfectly. The garments are designed to fit the proportions of a normal human being, unlike other ones I've purchased that look like they were made with a vaguely humanoid alien in mind. I'm a size 8 dress, 5'6", and weigh 139 lbs. and ordered a medium, which fits very well. The dress hugs all of my curves in a very flattering way, with the exception that the top of the back is slightly loose, probably due to the fact that my chest is slightly small in proportion to the rest of my body. Other commenters mentioned that the dress is very short, but for my proportions, it's not any shorter than pictured. The main complaint seems to be the mask, and I can see why. It fits over my eyes correctly, but it's made of a pretty stiff rubber that digs into my eyelids. However, I found that if I just wear the mask over my glasses it fixes this problem and looks fine. If you're lucky enough to have perfect vision, I would recommend buying a cheap pair of sunglasses or reading glasses at the drugstore, popping out the lenses, and wearing the mask over them. I think the costume works great as is, but if I had the time I might have glued on some extra fake ivy to jazz it up a little. Overall, I am extremely pleased with this purchase, and am looking forward to being a hot redheaded villainess on Halloween :)

product_title: PattyBoutik Mama V Neck Long Sleeve Wrap Tied Straps Stretch Maternity Knit Top
review_headline: Great quality but design different to what was expected.
review_body: I love the look of this top in the picture but  was disappointed with the actual design. It comes beautifully packaged, the berry color is lovely and fabric is a very nice medium weight. Not in the least bit flimsy or thin. However, the top is actually a very short crop length that doesn't cover my belly which then requires the wearer to perfectly wrap the ties to ensure no flesh is exposed. It's not that difficult but didn't leave me feeling comfortably covered during the day when you are moving around constantly or shifting the top slightly to use the restroom etc. As the top moves it's easy for the long lengths of fabric to adjust and ruin the look of the top. I wish the length was longer and then the ties wrapped over the top. I feel like it's going to be too much work to wear as often as I'd like and just leaves me feeling like my belly/back could be exposed too easily.

product_title: Dickies Men's Zip-Fly Pull-On Scrub Pant
review_body: This is the second pair of dickies scrubs I've purchased. The first was 6 years ago.  I finally bought a second pair when the zipper gave out. I have other scrub pants. Most have been little better than pajama pants.  The other pair that I had for awhile was a pair of Cherokee pants.  My problem with those was that they were not true to size, and the pockets started to fray and I had to stitch them back on. This happened to each side twice. When I blew out the crotch trying to help move a patient that was the last thing I was willing to tolerate. In 6 years the only problem I had with the dickies scrubs was the button falling off in the wash. But since it has belt loops (so awesome) that's not a problem. If you are in the healthcare field and you actually use your pockets, dickies are worth the price. They last. They'll fade a bit but they are worth the price.

The fit is odd for me, although it's definitely because it's a men's jacket and doesn't accommodate the curves of the average woman. The top portion fits super large on me while the bottom portion is a little snug in the hips area. So if you're a man, then I would estimate that this coat probably runs a size larger than normal, which is good for layering if you intend on wearing a sweatshirt or sweater underneath.

review_headline: Great but not for my butt.
review_body: It's not the shorts,  it's the person.  I am a 28 in the waist. But purchased a size 30. For one particular reason...i have a butt. When I put the 30s on they fit really good. But when I look at my physique from the back or side there is so much space needed to be filled. So I really needed to buy a size 28...but can't because I have a large athletic butt.  So I had to buy a size 32 in red because the cool blue and green were sold out. ..crazy I'm a size 28 wearing a 32. They fit the same around my thighs and nicely around my butt.  They look good, and feel good as well. They are very light weight, thin material, but a good quality. If they restock the blue/green color I Will buy them in a size 32.

product_title: J.TOMSON Womens Boyfriend Blazer BLACK
review_headline: I like the fit of this and it looks great on
review_body:
I like the fit of this and it looks great on. My unhappiness with it however is my blazer arrived in a plastic bag and when I took it out of the bag, I noticed how badly my new jacket REEKED. I don't know how or why, but it was packaged and sent to me smelling musky and gross like bad body odor. This blazer is labeled hand wash only, so of course, I went ahead and hand washed it (nothing but red dye gushing out of my brand new black blazer, which left it already looking slightly faded) and hung it to dry and wore it the next day thinking it was fine. Nope! Had to take it off when I got to work when I realized it still STANK BADLY. Now I'm going to have to pay good money to have my brand new, already faded blazer dry cleaned because the seller mailed it to me stinking of body odor and moth balls.

Thanks for that, seller. 1 star for you.

product_title: AM Landen Korean Style Super Cute Backpack School Bag Can Fit 15\Laptop"
review_headline: Cute design, but a bit awkward to wear and limited space
review_body:
I just got my bag and I was so excited! It looked very nice and the material seemed to be quite sturdy. It arrived within about about 5 days after my purchase, which was pretty awesome. However what I dislike about it is that it's a little bit too wide and it doesn't have too much space to hold my stuff, I could only fit about 2 small binders, 1 notebook, my wallet and my glasses on the inside. This is a problem because I have so many books to carry around while I'm at school. Also, the straps are way too long for my liking, the backpack doesn't really fit well onto my back due to this and it gets very awkward and uncomfortable. I think this bag would be much better suited for a taller person, I'm only 5'3. I really do like the design, but I'm probably going to have to return it due the the issue of the straps and the limited amount of space.
~
12/16/12 So I've had this bag for a couple of days and due to the shipping charges I wasn't able to return it. However I did fix the straps by sewing them a little bit tighter so they fit better and I also made the flap at the front of the bag a little bit tighter. I'm really satisfied with it, if only it had arrived that way.

product_title: Traveling Gypsy Costume - Plus Size 3X/4X - Dress Size 22-26
review_headline: Please show us Roma (Gypsies) how it's done
review_body: I am a Romany woman (ethnically Gypsy, with ancestors originally from India), and I see now that I have been dressing wrong my entire life. Whether I have honored the modest, whole-leg-covering skirts of my ancestors or worn the suits of my current profession, I am not being authentic OR mystic despite the fact that I speak Romani, an Indic language, fluently. Please, dear White non-Roma, show me how I must look, act and be so that I may fit your image of my people in the future. May we always be as sexy, mysterious, suspicious, "nomadic" and/or nonexistent as you need us to be. I just love being reduced to a stereotype - helps me teach my kids who they are, too.

review_body: Bought the orange wig for my 8 year old....she's a scary clown for Halloween this year.  The wig fit her perfectly, and she totally loved it!  The seller was clownantics and they were also a pleasure to deal with.  Ordered it on Sept. 24 and received it on Sept. 25.  Blazing fast shipping and amazing customer service.  Thanks Clownantics...!

product_title: Hanes Men’s FreshIQ ComfortBlend Boxer Brief 3-Pack
review_body: Shame on me for not paying attention to the name, "ComfortBLEND". This was not what I wanted. I prefer 100% cotton briefs. Though they seem like they might be nice in the summer, I find them much too light for the cold winter that we're having in NY. What really annoyed me though was the fact that both assorted packs were the same. 2 medium blue and 1 grey. So while I can't give them low marks on comfort, I can give Hanes a low score for poor decision making when it comes to choosing the colors in the packs.

product_title: Offspring- Baby Girls  Butterfly Floral Footie with Hat
review_headline: Super cute and baby loves it!
review_body:
My daughter got this set, and a few other PJ set's by Offspring for Christmas, and while the hat's are pretty much useless, the PJ's themselves are very comfy, light, and super cute patterns.

The butterflies on this pattern are not very clearly butterflies in the way that most little girl PJ's have clear, obvious butterflies with smiles, etc. but they are more outlines. And they are super cute.

My daughter loves to wear her PJ's from Offspring as a cute \\\\\around the house\\\\\" outfit, or as just a pair of PJ's. The only thing that I find I don't like, is the hat that comes with each set. My daughter's head was 16.8\\\\\" at her 6 month check up, and the hats for these outfits are fit like they were all made for a newborn.

Overall, would absolutely adorable - would totally recommnd them to others, but I would ditch the hat!"

review_headline: Magnetic buckle's great--but this is a little plain

But it just looked plain, so I went to the dollar store and bought packages of stickers to put on the smooth buckle. Now the belt is the "sticker belt." The good news is the magnetic buckle--easily manipulated when a little one has waited until the last minute to run to the bathroom.

review_headline: Great costume, a little pricey but worth it
review_body: Great costume, a little pricey but worth it. Only problem with it is the mask, it's Shrek size. I ordered another mask separately on Amazon and it was a great fit. If you do that I would get shoe polish and shine the other mask you buy though because the costume is a shiny black and the mask is a flat black. If you want to stand out in a great way at a party or comic con, this is a great costume for it.

product_title: Ever Pretty Sleeveless V-Neck Semi-Formal Maxi Dress 09016
review_body:
I don't really mind buying imitation apparel if it is good quality workmanship and it doesn't try to pass itself off as something else. I had bought this dress for an upcoming event because I believed the reviews about the quality and fit. It just arrived today, and I am so very, very sorely disappointed with everything about it, I am at the verge of tears.

The material is very cheap looking in person. It is so poor quality, and makes the dress look like something one picks up at a flea market as a bathing suit coverup. The midrift \\\\\ruching\\\\\" is poorly done, and instead looks like a ratty oversized t-shirt gathered at the sides and hangs loose around the middle. No amount of ironing this thing will ever make it look right.

I expected better quality construction at least for the pricetag of over $120. This is supposed to be an evening dress, but I wouldn't even wear it to a family BBQ, and now I am stuck without a dress for my event.

NEVER AGAIN."

product_title: Panache Women's Underwire Sports Bra
review_headline: An absolute must purchase for active, large breasted women.
review_body:
If you are an active and large breasted woman, I'd highly recommend this bra.
I do adult gymnastics and this bra provides me enough support for tumbling on the floor and vaulting: I am a 28H for reference.
The band is nice and wide along the rib cage, the wire doesn't extend underneath my arms, and the arm straps are wide and padded.
However, my favorite thing about this bra is that it is breathable. You can't tell from the pictures but there is the main frame of the bra, then the mesh covering. They left a small gap between the mesh and the frame at the middle of the bra. This is a feature the larger breasted of us usually don't get.

TIP: Don't put this in the drier. I've had mine for two years and the band losing its elasticity (as to reasonably be expected) is the over give I've seen with it.

product_title: Dockers Mens Print Knit Jersey Sleep Pant
review_headline: Exactly what I was looking for
review_body:
First, to the reviewer who said these are flannel and who, as a 6', 33\\\\\-waisted man, found these to be too small: it sounds to me like you either got the wrong product by mistake or you're reviewing the wrong product by mistake.

These aren't flannel, they're jersey cotton (t-shirt material). I'm 6'1\\\\\" and have a 33\\\\\" waist and I bought the large, which fits perfectly. Surprisingly perfectly, actually; most size lists tell men with my waist size to buy medium, and both mediums and larges are often too short. These have enough elastic that they fit comfortably at my waist with several inches of stretch left and yet aren't too big...and are still plenty long enough with room to shrink.

These pants are very lightweight, so I'll probably need to trade them in for a heavier flannel or fleece or something when winter truly hits, but they're perfect pajamas spring and fall. And they have pockets! [Drives me crazy when sleep pants don't have pockets.]

Good quality, good price, good description (other reviewer: that last is directed at you)...good choice."

product_title: Black Venetian Half Feather Mask (style varies)
review_body:
I purchased this mask for Halloween, and the pictures don't really do it justice. In person, the glitter is a lot more blended and doesn't look like it was applied with a roller glue like in the picture. The feathers are nicely put together and it's pretty durable... as it did last me all of Halloween, with a few drops in between. It is also tied with two ribbons on each side. The ribbons are attached really securely so they won't snap/break, it does untie pretty easily since it's ribbon however, unless you double knot it.

The only qualms I have about the mask are that the bottom feathers kind of run into my nose/mouth area. This can be cute, however, it can also look as though you have a moustache.

Overall, it's a very cute mask for any occassion that requires it!

product_title: The Mountain Three Wolf Moon Short Sleeve Tee
review_body:
If your reading this review, I know you're wondering if the hype surrounding this attire is authentic or shennanigans to whip up a marketing buzz on unsuspecting consumers? I mean, certainly two thousand reviews can't all be telling the truth?

Here is my unbiased review, continue reading at your own perril. The only reason I can write this review, is because I'm wearing the Mountain Three Wolf Moon tee shirt, I couldn't read or write until donning this majestic garment, I've read Jack Londons \\\\\White Fang\\\\\" cover to cover in fifteen minutes flat with complete conprehention, and I just learned to read yesterday!

The moment I dressed in this mysterious attire, I knew I had stumbled upon a glorious freak of power. It happens instantly, I immediately kicked off my shoes and trotted out the back door. Time seemed to stop, kinda like the matrix, and my senses were one with the land. Smells and sounds were acutely more distinct, I could see and move with ease, almost wolflike, and I remember thinking, could this be? My persona had transformed from ultimate dweeb to Brad Pitt in Legends Of The Fall. The most interesting man in the world from the Dos Equis beer commercials has this shirt, I'm sure of it.

The beast within was taking over, and I remember how awesome it felt to feel so free for the very first time. It was the most fantastic moment and it was interrupted suddenly when my girlfriend yelled at me for relieving myself on her flowers. I quickly unlifted my leg and whimpered back to the house. She met me at the door, and I was expecting an ear pulling and told \\\\\"bad dog!\\\\\" at the very least. What happened next confirmed the questions overwhelming my carniferous brain. I could tell my girl friend was livid and was about to chew me out big time, but the moment her eyes locked onto my Mountain Three Wolf Moon tee shirt, her intended rage vanished and turned into a lust craved she wolf. I won't elaborate what happend next, but she sang Who Let The Dogs Out five hours straight after that, crazy as f*** I know!

I happend to walk by a mirror and had to stop, my tongue was friggin ginormous, it would make Gene Simmons from Kiss feel inadaquete I kid you not! Trust me though, the women in your life will be your best friend for life, even if they hated you before. Just don't wear it around your ex-gf or wives, unless you want them stalking you like a sexed crazed creeper on meth and if they get too close to you, plan on a trip to the ER to have them surgicly removed. I made the mistake of wearing mine to church and an hour later my yard was filled with nuns smoking cigars trying to shove cash down my pants with money they stole from the collection plate.

One last bonus that you can expect while wearing your Mountain Three Wolf Moon tee shirt is, bullies and would be thugs will be rendered powerless in your presence. I decided to test this at the local bar, A**Kick, notorious for harboring inbred gorrilla type people. They wear affliction and tapout shirts stained in syrup and rancid beer. At midnight, when the moon was full, I walked through the door, and that's when all hell broke loose. Any normal Joe would have been mauled and raped walking into this place by themselves, but I had my wolf pack with me. The moment my foot crossed the threshold of the bar, the music stopped and the cool night wind blew from behind me, sending shivers to all those inside. Goons and felons scrambled for the nearest exit, trampling each other, as if oxegen had escaped them and were fighting for their last breath. The unfortunate few who made eye contact with The Pack, it did not end well for them. They instantly fell into a cowering heap, submissively urinating themselves and whining like little b*tches, snot bubbles drippin down their noses. The female Dj tipped her hat and played Wild Thing and Bad Moon Rising consecutively for the rest of the night and I drank for free.

There are some who will not understand this bewildering garment of power, which I believe is made of actual wolf hair, and some will follow their instinct and forever be changed into their wolf pack, to those of you I solute you and will join you in song when the moon turns full.
I have spoken and it is so."

product_title: Custom Accessories 10709W E-Tek Digital Multi-Meter
review_headline: Great meter for the beginner electronic hobbyist.
review_body:
I bought this meter from Walmart, sorry I didn't get it from amazon lol. Anyway this is a great meter for some one just starting out as a electronics hobbyist. Has many features. The continuity tester works like a charm, reads and beeps quickly. Only two issues with it. It's not a auto ranging meter and don't know if anyone else has experienced this but the diode test doesn't work.

I wouldn't compare this to a high end meter but it's the only cheap meter under 20 dollars that even has a CAT ratting. This meter is rated as a CAT II at 600volts.

product_title: Custom Accessories 91126 Grey Seat Wedge Cup Holder
review_headline: decent but not if you have a center console
review_body:
I purchased two of these. I put one in between the passenger seat and console of my F150. It works fine when I'm by myself and I want to stick my wallet in the holder but if I have a passenger it is uncomfortable for them. Also, the cup holders should have been designed better so a can or smaller cup (diameter) can stand up firmly and not wobble.

Bought one also for durango and immediately removed it as its even more uncomfortable for the passenger. Both vehicles have center consoles so maybe it will work better if your car does not have one.

I thought it was a good idea but wouldn't completely recommend it.

review_body: First of all this was sub post to be a "smart alarm", it isn't. If it is turned on the noise from itself will sometimes bump it up to full volume, which isn't that loud. When it is switched on it is very quiet and it takes a long time to become loud enough to hear, which by the time you're done backing up it still won't be audible. Even when it adjusts itself, 5db above other noises is not noticeable and quite unsafe. This was going on a cummins plow truck with straight piped exhaust so it needed to be loud. 107db is not loud enough for a diesel. Returned and am instead going with a simple ECCO 850 with 112db for the same price.

review_body: Works like a dream.  Without a doubt, the most effective ice scraper I've ever used.  It doesn't leave any frost behind, even with just moderate pressure applied to the windshield.  It also has not--as far as I can see--left any scratches on the glass.  It has happily withstood the trials of a New England winter.

product_title: Security Chain Company SZ115 Super Z6 Cable Chain for Passenger Cars, Pickups, and SUVs - Set of 2
review_body:
The SZ451 was supposed to fit my 2004 Dodge Ram 1500 2WD with 275/60-20 Goodyear Wrangler SR-A tires. I had managed to get them on once before after fighting with the fit for close to an hour. The second time I attempted to use them it took 45 minutes to put on one side during a snow storm in the Sierras on Christmas Eve. The fit is so tight that it took both me and my 17 year-old son, using all our strength, to make the final connection. I just put new Goodyear All-Terrain Adventure tires in the same size on last week. Today I tried a dry-fit test in my driveway. There is NO WAY the SZ451 is going to fit that tire, even though the SCC fitment guide says it will.

I bought a set of "Titan Chain Alloy Snow Tire Chains - Diamond Pattern - Square Link" chains today after watching a Youtube video showing the ease of their installation. I'll update this after I get them and have performed a dry-fit test.

UPDATE - 2-16-2015: This afternoon I performed a dry-fit test of the "Titan Chain Alloy Snow Tire Chains - Diamond Pattern - Square Link Model TC2533" tire chains. What a difference it was to install these compared to the SZ451. The instructions were super simple and I installed the first side, without jacking up the vehicle, in approximately 6 minutes with no hassles or troubles at all. I HIGHLY recommend the Titan chain if you have 275/60-20 tires.

If you need more proof watch this You Tube video, or just do a Web search for the chain:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lNjFLIKtoec

UPDATE: 12-19-2015: SCC has changed their fitment guide and no longer lists the 275/60-20 tire as applicable for the SZ451. Unfortunately it is too late to return the chains for a refund.

product_title: Lumitronics Double LED RV Dome Light with On/Off Switch and Removable Lenses. Perfect Interior Replacement 12V Lighting for RVs, Motorhomes, Campers, 5th Wheels, Trailers.
review_body:
Very pleased with the units. "Warm white" is pushing it a bit but the color is a pleasant bright white with no blue overtones. The light output seems a bit better than the twin 1003 bulb units I replaced. I'd put the output somewhere between a 1003 and an 1156. The lighting is a touch uneven but much better than other units I've seen. The lens is a diamond design to the sides spreading the light with a small clear patch at the bottom projecting a little more light towards the floors, table or whatever, a nice touch. Everything fit correctly and uses modern surface mount technology on the LED boards.

I'm satisfied enough I'm going to replace all the old fixtures in my RV with these units. The small current draw versus incandescent alone is worth it for boondocking.

product_title: WeatherTech 440661 Custom Fit Front FloorLiners (Black)
review_body: I looked at several floorliner manufacturers, and chose Weathertech because my sister-in-law has them in her 2012 Silverado and she likes them.They fit well in her truck. I ordered these for my 2007 Silverado and am dissapointed in their fit. They are made of a good material, but they don't fit my floorboards very well. Triple checked application before ordering. The drivers side mat slides forwards and backwards several inches, and will not stay in one place. The little screw in carpet holders are a joke. They will not screw in to help hold the mat in place. The passenger side liner fits better, but not a great fit as described. I even checked the numbers again to make sure it is the mats that Weathertech calls for, and it is the correct number. These mats have no spikes on the bottom to hold them in place like other companies. Super fast delivery by Amazon. They were supposed to be a week and a half delivery time and I got them in 3 days! If I was to make this purchase again, I would go with another brand.5 stars for Amazon, 3 stars for the mats.

product_title: Hellwig 7671 Rear Sway Bar
review_body:
The 2nd gen Toyota Tacoma PreRunners and 4x4s don't come with a rear sway bar setup from the factory for rear articulation; but if you hardly go off road, adding a rear sway bar could make a big difference. I drive a 2010 Tacoma PreRunner and decided to purchase the Hellwig 7671.

Pros: Easy installation, Reduced body roll, positive steering feedback, cleared my aftermarket exhaust

Cons: Installation instruction pictures could be more detailed

Bottom line: If you hardly go off road and enjoy driving on mountain roads and taking quick turns, then I'd highly recommend investing in a rear sway bar.

product_title: 1998-2000 Volvo V70 Power Window Master Control Switch
review_body: No problems with the switch. It fit perfectly and the material seems to be better than the original piece. It cost a little more than some others on the internet but is worth it and is still much lower than an OEM piece. The regular shipping also arrived faster than estimated. This was the second of the same switch I bought for the car in the past few months. The first switch was bought on eBay and was less expensive. When I tried to install it, it did not fit in the position, had no directions on how to install it, plus some of the switches were spotty and did not work all of the time. I returned it with a letter and follow up email to the company and eBay but did not get a reply nor a refund. Hence, why I tried Amazon and the Switch Doctor who had instructions plus a lifetime money back policy.

product_title: ZANheadgear Neoprene Face Mask
review_body: The best face mask I have had, got so many complements fro bus drivers, cops, and people walking pass me on the streets.  Keeps you warm with out have to be all sweated.  I love this thing.  NYC winters walking 40 minutes at 1Am to 3Am high wind, snow, still kept me warm, fit really well.  This mask was so good that people at my school notice and one day after class I went to pick up my jacket and saw that someone had stolen it from my inside pocket.  I don't know how this mask will work in Alaska or somewhere hardcore like that ,but for NYC winter, North jersey Winter, Main winters ( went biking up there, and had no issues with it)  I also went running during the winter with it and it rocked.

It could stand to be a little longer for my inaccurate parking jobs... but very good nonetheless. Even has two holes cut out so you can drill the sucker into a wall if need be.

Note: The vinyl tape that it says is frequently purchased with this product will not work on a textured (stucco) wall.

product_title: ACDelco 214-2151 GM Original Equipment Air Injection Valve
review_body: I ordered this valve after my check engine light came on in my 2008 Chevy Trailblazer. I initially shopped around, I checked on Autozone as well as a local shop in town. They both wanted a large amount of money to supply the part (~300$). So, I hopped on Amazon, and using the handy Amazon garage's search tool, I found this gem. It arrived in about two days and took me about 20 minutes to install. A truly great deal for a genuine AC Delco part.

product_title: Cabin Bright-15-18 Inch 12 Volt LED Fluorescent Tube Replacement -NEW DESIGN!-
review_body:
I thought I'd try the Cabin Bright LED's to conserve battery power-we dry camp on BLM land most every winter. LED's are by far the most energy-efficient lighting using just a fraction of the power required of other types of lighting. LED lighting should also last MUCH longer than any other light.

Installation was easy-just dry run it before peeling sticky-pads. There's even a video on YouTube showing typical install.

I had a technical question about light output (which is warm white as opposed to the cool white from the tubes), so I emailed Cabin Bright directly.

Within two hours I had a personal phone call from Joe, the owner, which resolved the issue.

These lights are awesome! I'm quite happy with the lights, and very impressed with the excellent customer service from Cabin Bright. I will be purchasing more of these LED's to complete the conversion of my rig.

I whole-heartedly recommend Cabin Bright to all my RV'ing friends!

product_title: 30cm LED Car Flexible Waterproof Light Strip (Pack of 4)
review_headline: Super Super Super bright and awesome looking!! No one can beat their price!!
review_body: I put these in my wheel wells of my lifted truck. I put 2 in each well. Super bright and can be seen from far away. All I get are OoOoO's and Ahhhh's. If you want nice bright LEDs these.  Also the 3M stick is ok, but I put extra glue on them so I know they would not fall off after dirt and rain hitting on and off. I bet they would look pretty sweet inside too. Cant ask for anything more. Buy these!!

product_title: iJDMTOY (2) 5202 H16 Wire Harness For Installing HID Ballast to Stock Socket for HID Conversion Kit
review_body: The H16 and 9006 connectors are pretty solid and the wire sheathing is an added bonus. The only gripe I have is the decision to use hot glue to seal the backside of the H16 connectors. Silicone would have been a much better choice. Other than that, this is a pretty good harness.

product_title: 2005 05 Chevrolet Impala Keyless Entry Remote - 4 Button
review_body:
Excellent price, deliver sooner than anticipated, it was very easy to set it up.

product_title: HJC RPHA MAX Modular Flip-Up Touring/Street Helmet
review_body: The helmet fits and the inner shield does not drop down to hit your nose.  Air leaks are nil which makes the helmet quiet and perfect when riding in cold weather.  I like the helmet so much I bought two.  Comfortable, very light weight and the chin bar locks with gentle pressure when closing the lid.  My old HJC helmet Symax III the lid had to be slammed on both helmets I owned.  This RPHA Max helmet is the way to go.  One problem, the top front air vent has a flimsy reed valve set up that can rattle in the wind. Both my helmets do it on two different motorcycles.  To stop this adjust your windshield or place some electrical tape over the vent or slip foam inside to control air inlet turbulence.  This rattling noise is a minor problem and easily managed, so I still give the helmet five stars.  And, you can bring the helmet to any authorized dealer for warranty repair, you do not have to return it to where you originally bought it according to HJC Warranty Instruction on their Website  JamesRussellPublishing.biz.

product_title: The Stubby Antenna Replacement | Ford F-150 2009-2018 | 3.2 inches | Made in USA | Installs in Seconds | Break, Chip, & Fade Resistant
review_body: I was a little reluctant at first after reading many reviews because many complained about it cutting out. I figured for the price it would be worth trying. I do not regret my purchase. It took all of two minutes to install, then I turned the radio on and pulled into the garage. As I entered there was a slight hesitation for about 4 seconds entering the doorway, then it picked back up and I have not had a problem since then. I use regular radio for two favorite local stations and usually keep it on satellite radio for other favorites. I live in an outlying area and receive with no issues. I've made trips to Charleston SC, Columbia SC, Atlanta GA and Savannah GA besides my local driving and no issues. The good part is the antenna doesn't hit the garage door anymore and is not an eye sore any longer. looks good on my 2013 Ford F150.

product_title: Venture Heat Unisex-Adult City Collection Heated Glove Liners
review_headline: Great gloves and great customer service
review_body:
I bought these in early winter of 2012. Throughout the winter they kept my hands warm on my cold steering wheel for 2 days between charges (about 2-3 hours at max temp). I also used them on a ski trip with outer protective gloves, In 20 degree windy weather, I turned them on at the bottom of the slopes and off while I skied down and they lasted all day (about 8 hours) without any cold fingers.

On the last cold day, I apparently dropped them on the floor of my car, batteries attached and left them there all summer. Come this winter, I found them and charged them back up. They worked great. Battery charge was just as long. But about 2 weeks after the warranty expired the right glove heating element stopped heating. I wrote to the service department. They asked me to send the gloves in with the receipt (which I promptly printed from Amazon). 2 days later I had a brand new set of gloves.

I highly recommend these gloves. Prior to using these, I always got chapped hands that cracked and bled in the winter despite use of various creams, etc. For some reason, keeping my hands warm makes all the difference in the world. I'd buy these again,

Sometimes when fancy cars pass me on I-10, I see their dull yellow lights..they just look tacky & washed out. If you're looking to give your car a little pick-me-up, just a small light like this makes all the difference.

review_headline: I like the fact that it fits perfect
review_body: works great. on average my car is 15 degrees cooler in the summer and I rest easy knowing the dashboard won't be damaged after a few years. I don't mind the bulkiness, when folded, since it is easy to put up and perfectly fits my vehicle.If you won't mind the bulkiness; you won't be sorry.

product_title: 36 Bright Red and Green LED Law Enforcement Flash Strobe Lights Bar for Windshield / Dash / Deck / Grille
review_headline: Shipping issues and felt like a run around
review_body: I would have gave more stars but I had to wait until the 29th of November when my package was supposed to be delivered on the 23rd the package sat at a ups facility for me to pickup per customer request a request I didn't make but the guy did get me the stuff in the end

product_title: Coverking Custom Fit Car Cover for Select Chevrolet Malibu Models - Mosom Plus (Gray)
review_headline: First and last time I will ever buy anything produced by Coverking.
review_body: The description stated a "soft fleece inner liner" but the cover I received had a liner material which appeared to be no different a material than the outer cover except it was white.  I talked to Amazon who referred me to the manufacturer Coverking.  I call Coverking and talk to their customer service which denies they state "soft fleece inner liner" in the description for the Mosom cover.  I tell her to take a look at their website.  She says she doesn't have access to the internet.  I tell her to take a look at their catalog which they enclosed with the shipment.  She denies it says that in their catalog either when it is right there in the major feature description.  I ask to speak to her supervisor and she tells me they are all out.  I ask that her supervisor give me a call back and I never heard from anyone.  I did return the cover and got a prompt refund from Amazon.  I will never consider buying anything produced by Coverking again.

product_title: Lisle 52000 Razor Blade Scraper
review_body: Handy tool for hard to reach places that need to be scraped.  I order this to clean our movie popcorn machine and it does get inside.  Useful for many other things.  Like that it came with extra blades.

product_title: New Yupbizauto Brand Premium Grade 11 Pieces Zebra Print Low Back Front Car Seat and Rear Bench Cover with Head Rest Cover Set
review_headline: Dont buy if your back seat has head rest
review_body: Is not what is advertised the front seats came with holes for the head rest so the seat covers could slide on but the back seat didn't so they do not fit on my back seat the seat cover they sent was clearly made for a bench seat with no head rest. The seat covers do not look the same as the ones advertised on amazon. Customer service wasn't to great either.

product_title: Power Stop K1612 Front and Rear Z23 Evolution Brake Kit with Drilled/Slotted Rotors and Ceramic Brake Pads
review_body:
My hubby installed these on my Malibu LTZ, after I complained about my brakes
getting hot while driving long distances and start to vibrate, even after hubby checked to make sure everything else was correct and in Good shape, realized they get hotter than most. These Drilled/slotted brake pads did the trick!
My brakes work better and I am very pleased with these. I will recommend anyone that has over heating of brakes to get these.
Fast shipping, and hubby had no problems installing them.

Thanks Again,
Happy Wife

product_title: Magnavault (Orion)- Heavy Duty Magnetic Stash Case / Box - High Impact Resistant
review_body: It serves it's purpose.  Very durable and I haven't lost it yet.  It could use a locking device just incase it does fall off a vehicle.

product_title: CURT 13068 Class 3 Trailer Hitch
review_headline: Super easy to install. Nice heavy duty unit.
review_body: Super easy to install with basic tools and a torque wrench. I installed this in my wife's 2006 Odyssey in about 20 minutes. Don't forget the wiring kit if you're actually going to pull a trailer. I just want it for my bike rack and maybe for a cargo rack...but I bought the Class III so I could pull a trailer later if I want to.

product_title: Depo 330-1938L-US Ford Escape/Escape Hybrid Left Rear Lamp/Tail Light Unit
review_body: Order this tail light for my 2008 ford escape, it came in quickly! It fit perfectly into place and took about 10 minutes to install. So much cheaper then the $200 dealership light!

product_title: Campbell IC6 Nice & Icy Disposable Filter
review_body: Very easy installation. Took my 1/4 inch copper tubing nicely and sealed up with no leaks. One thing not mentioned in the instructions is to run about 5 gallons of water through the filter by attaching the inlet end of the filter to your tubing and letting the water flow into a bucket or something similar. This will remove non poisonous carbon dust. If you don't rinse it out, your first few batches will look like snow plowed off asphalt.

product_title: ATP Automotive FA-14  Carbon Activated Premium Cabin Air Filter
review_body: Oh man..you gotta check your cabin air filter.  If it was anything like mine it will be full of dirt and hair.  Totally disgusting.  Clean that thing out and impress your significant other with air as clean as a unicorns flatulence.

product_title: WARBIRD 22\ x 65\" Rear Window Graphic bald eagle truck view thru vinyl"
review_body: Excellent Graphics at an affordable price. The farther back you stand after applying this product, the more eye-catching it becomes! Have had many compliments on it. Looks very aggressive, and definitely turns heads!

product_title: Dorman 85936 Conduct Tite Universal Key Starter Switch
review_body: I bought this for my old Massey Fergusson tractor, this type of switch does not require a separate push button to engage the starter it instead works the same as your car does. It has four terminals on the back. One goes straight to battery, another goes to starter solenoid, third is an accessary terminal for lights or other 12v units, and I don't know what the fourth is four, ohms meter does not show the center terminal grounds against the metal switch body. It works for my needs.

review_body: Cheap bleed kit, same as every other one on here and most of what you will find in the auto parts store. Def a cheap little product but I think people who buy this aren't looking for too much, just something to get the job done for cheap.

product_title: Lund 22610514 3\ Round Bent Stainless Steel Nerf Bar"
review_body: These nerf bars were purchased for a 2014 Silverado 1500 half ton pickup.  I received these yesterday and installed them the same day.  Amazon wins again with prompt shipment and delivery.  Lund's nerf bars help my truck to look like a truck.  The price at Amazon was lower than anyplace I could find ($188).  Installation was a breeze.  On each side of my truck there were already two nuts welded into place which meant that four of the supplied clip on nuts were not needed.  I have purchased Westin's nerf bars in past.  I hope these will stand the test of time and not rust.  I will follow up in a couple of years and re-post.

review_body: Use these on my Accord, 3 times already, am getting about 80,000 miles out of them. I change when the pad gets down to 25%.I always install new rotors when replacing pads, these may be to harsh on older rotors, dust is more than average.

review_body: Granted Porsche should have put these features on the car in the first place. They didn't but so we have this accessory to do it for us. Here in TX its great to be able to open the top on the car remotely and let the heat out before opening the door.

product_title: 1997-2002 Jeep Wrangler (TJ) Soft Top Bestop Jeep Soft Top 51124-37 97 98 99 00 01 02
review_body:
Excellent product & excellent customer support. Every detail was verified prior to shipment to insure this product was the proper match for my particular Jeep model.

Shipment was on schedule. I received email status confirms as promised. Product arrived on time . Good customer service follow- up.

Product is excellent. I'm very pleased with this entire experience. It deserves more than the maximum 5 stars!!!

product_title: ACDelco D465 Professional Ignition Distributor Rotor
review_body: Ordered this to replace the parts on my Blazer as i had bought it last october and got no records of anything getting done on it. Came to find out today that the rotor was still the factory one, so glad to have my car running a lot better now than it was before. Thank you ACDelco

product_title: ACCEL Ignition SuperCoil
review_body: I installed a set of 8 ACCEL coils into my 2005 Ford F-150 with 5.4L V-8 motor and 72,000 miles.  I did the coils at the same time as renewing the spark plugs, mainly because of the labor savings.  The ACCEL coils fit as good as the OEM ones.  Between the new spark plugs and the coils, the engine does feel smoother at idle, and seems to be more responsive at acceleration.  ACCEL uses high quality materials that should stay within spec longer, and has experience in developing high performance products.  And, more importantly, ACCEL has quality controls to match the electrical characteristics requirements with precision and consistency -- which is the key to a good coil.  Since any gain in horsepower is the same as a gain in mileage, and with the high price of gasoline, then it makes sense to invest in this small upgrade.  It is also good to look at those yellow coil packs on the engine.

product_title: HJC Chin Curtain for CL-15 and CL-SP Helmets - --/--
review_headline: No directions on how to properly install!
review_body: I can't rate the performance of this product because I have not been able to install it!  I gave it three stars because, I bought the breath box as well, and love it!

product_title: ACDelco 18R1378 Professional Rear Disc Brake Caliper Assembly with Pads (Loaded), Remanufactured
review_body:
This says it will fit my 2003 Chevy Suburban Z71's rear end, however it does not fit. It is a very nice looking loaded Brake Caliper (ACDelco 18R1379 and 18R1378) and I was disappointed it didn't fit. This was my first return to Amazon and it has been a very smooth process!

I did find these that did: Raybestos FRC11169 and Raybestos FRC11170. I then opted to put on Raybestos ATD834C AT Ceramic Pads. In the end I got a better brake pads for a few bucks more.

I have this 3 stars only due to compatibility problems.

product_title: AlphaMoto Motorcycle Shock Coil Spring Compressor Tool Kit Xs Cb
review_body:
After receiving a $250+ tax quote from the local Ducati shop to change my rear spring, and an entire day of searching for another shop that would even DO this work, I decided to check out other options. This tool fit the bill perfectly. I used it to remove the stock 8.8 kgm rear spring and replace it with an 11.6 kgm spring on my 98 Ducati ST-2. Everything worked great. Job done.
(WARNING: a compressed spring has a tremendous amount of stored energy and is VERY dangerous.)

product_title: 2000-2005 Lincoln LS Folding Style Sun Shade
review_headline: 2000-2005 Lincoln LS Folding Style Sun Shade
review_body: this fits my flat black '02 Lincoln LS that soaks up most of the sun all day... this does keep it cooler and fits perfect

product_title: Bosch 04278 Ignition Rotor
review_headline: Does what it is supposed to do
review_body:
Works perfectly on a 1997 Honda Prelude. Replaced the rotor as the same time as the distributor cap and wires and plugs. Might as well since you are in there and it is so cheap.

The trick to getting it off is that the one screw that holds it in, is only accessible when the engine cylinders are in a specific location. I found it easiest to disconnect all the spark plugs so it wouldn't actually start then crank the car momentarily. After you crank go and check if the screw is there. If not, crank again, check again. Took me about 8 tries, but it is really random. The precise way of doing it is to turn it by hand or to put in gear and roll it slowly, but I found it much easier to just crank and try.

product_title: Delphi FG0235 Fuel Pump Module
review_body: This fuel pump was an excellent fit easy enough to install and now my 98 Dodge Dakota is back on the road.

product_title: BO OBX Performance Exhaust Header 95-01 Nissan Maxima 3.0L V6 VQ30DE

product_title: StrongArm 6104 Jeep Grand Cherokee Liftgate Lift Support, Pack of 1
review_body: In cold weather, my hatch wouldn't stay up. After replacing both struts, the hatch springs open and stays up better than my old ones ever did.

product_title: High Temperature High Gloss Self Leveling Brush On Black G2 Brake Caliper Paint System Kit
review_body: Got the black to match my black 11' mustang GT.  follow the directions and its a breeze, dismount all 4 tires, clean up all the parts, mix up the paint and you're good to go.  I had a LOT leftover, and I painted all 4 Caliper, caliper brackets, fronts, backs, underneath, SPILLED some (careful of that...stained my garage floor) then I painted the rotor hats to hide that nasty rust.  Still had some leftover but couldn't think of anything else to paint.  allowed to cure as reccomended.  1 month later and no issues to date.

product_title: Specialty Products Company 305227 Installing Adapter for RWD/4WD Ball Joint Press (Part No: 72509)
review_headline: It's just the piece, not the whole kit
review_body:
When I bought this, Amazon had a picture of the entire basic press-puller kit. I thought that's what I was getting--the whole kit, for a price a little better than even Harbor Freight's press-puller kit could be had. So, i bit. and then back it went, with my suggestion to Amazon that they update the picture of the product as you see they have done now.

I ended up using a 20% coupon at Harbor Freight during a sale, and I got their press-puller kit for about $40. And, I have to say, the Harbor Freight press-puller kit worked just fine on both my vehicles, a 98 Ford F150, and a 03 VW van. I used the HF kit to do both upper and lower ball joints. If you are in need of purchasing a press-puller kit, I'd suggest taking a look at the one from HF. You can save at least $50.

product_title: SUSPA C16-02622 Gas Spring 28 Lb Force Per Prop, Set of 2
review_body: These were a perfect replacement for my worn out camper door, I will be sure to purchase them here for any future needs.

product_title: Tire Pressure Gauge - Easy To Use Accurate Digital Tire Gauge from Life-Plicity - For Trucks Cars And Bikes - Multi Tool With Built In Escape Glass Hammer, Seat Belt Cutter and Flashlight
review_headline: A very practical multi-tool to keep in the car
review_body: I was looking to replace my old tire gauge with something more accurate and this turned out to be a lot more than that. Not only is it accurate, it's very easy to use, and has other tools that are neatly compact, such as pliers, scissors, a flashlight, and two kinds of screwdrivers. There's also a seat belt cutter and a glass hammer, in case I'm ever in an auto accident. This is a very practical tool to keep in the car. It stores nicely in the glove compartment or console. You couldn't ask for a better bargain. The product arrived on time, and was everything I'd hoped it would be and more.

review_body:
After a quick installation (less than one hour), the ride on my Pathfinder has a dramatic improvement. I installed just before a long road trip, with a lot of weight. There was no sagging at all. Well worth the money.

I recommend installing with isolated air values to each bag, instead of using the T-valve. These will prevent the air from moving from the left and right side while in turns, providing you more stability.

review_body: I kept looking at this seat and thinking can it really be worth the money. Finally found it here at a great price and decided to purchase. I'm so glad I did. product_title: Gibson 12216 Single Exhaust System
review_headline: Excellent exhaust system, Weak U- Clamps
review_body:
The Gibson exhaust is an excellent CAT-Back system. Once Broken in, the sound was really good. power is noticeable at high revs (dont expect much difference though).
The only negative thing is the week clamps supplied with the system. I was tighting them to 65 ft/lb (recommended by manufacturer) and the clamp thread snapped. Gibson after sales service is really excellent as they have sent a replacement straightaway. I opted to buy a Stainless Steel Clamps so i would avoind having the same problem.
Another negative thing is that the stainless steel Tip was affected by the exhaust heat and i could see rust and colour changes in it.
Aside from that the performance is excellent.

product_title: Cruiser Accessories 72200 Bubble Shield Novelty / License Plate Shield, Smoke

The mechanics were familiar with the product and the service manager assured me this would not void my warranty in anyway. The truck looks really tough leveled.
