product_title: 2008-2010 Ford Escape + Hybrid Uncut Keyless Entry Remote Head Key With Do-It-Yourself Programming and eKeylessRemotes Guide (Procedure Requires Two Working Keys)
review_headline: Not the same as original, but programmed fine!
review_body:
When I bought my car It only came with 1 key so I ordered this to have a 2nd. If you only have 1 key to start with you will have to have this professionally programmed by a dealer. I hated this key when I first got it, the buttons are set down in, instead of being raised like the original key, so they are hard for me to push. But when I took it to the shop to be programmed, I also bought an original for $150. The dealership could not program their manufacturer key for some unknown reason, but this key that I got from amazon programmed within a few minutes. I ended up leaving there with just the 2 keys, saved a bunch of money and was extremely glad I bought this generic one.

Differences from original manufacturer key:
-Doesn't say Ford on it
-Buttons are recessed, not raised
-Can be hard to push

Pros!! Programmed like a dream and I saved $100

product_title: Edelbrock 9725 Valve Stem Seal
review_body:
Edelbrock 9725 Valve Stem Seal
These are universal seals and fit many different size heads. I am redoing a set of SBC 882 HEADS AND THESE ARE CORRECT FOR THAT APPLICATION. I called Edelbrock to confirm fit before ordering.
These are far Superior to stock O-RING seals and it's even possible to use these with the small O-RING seals if you wanted to.
I am very happy with the fit and finish of these positive seals and think you will be also.
Buy these seals with confidence from a quality company.
RagenRat

product_title: Valley 90590 Deluxe Hitch Mount Cargo Basket
review_body:
Just assembled my cargo basket. It was one of the simplest items I have ever assembled! It took me mo more than twenty minutes and would have been less if I hadn't gotten over zealous and tightened the plates all the way before putting the bar on (why would I read the instructions first, I'm a man). I am using this on my 2010 Honda Pilot.
My only complaint thus far is that the hitch pin should be a bit longer to facilitate ease of securing the safety pin. It's a tight fit. I have a spare from other hitches that I can use.
I agree with other reviews about the paint not holding up so well.
Will update after my trip for practicality and ease of use.

product_title: Accutire MS-4355GB Programmable Tire Gauge
review_headline: Accutire MS-4355B Tire Gauge works great!
review_body: This tire gauge is very easy to use.  The head swivels which makes it so much easier than many of the other tire gauges.  The digital read-out is very easy to read for even for the over 40 folks who can't see small letters. You don't even have to turn it on - if you put the gauge on, it turns on as soon as it senses air pressure.    My ONLY reason for giving it four starts instead of five is that it only reads in .5 PSI.  It's digital, so I would think it wouldn't have been that much more difficult to read in .1 PSI.  But maybe that keeps the cost down, which is a good trade-off for me if that's the case because I wouldn't pay more for the extra level of granularity.  I haven't had it that long so I can't attest to the battery life.  The case is also nice to protect it if you keep it in your glove box.  Overall it's well made and solid.

product_title: Quad Gear UTV Roll Cage Top Polaris Ranger 2002-2008 Series
review_body: This top works well when the Ranger is off the trailer going at it's speed. I twice tried to tow the Ranger on a trailer going 55 MPH down the highway. The first time one corner came loose and started flapping, I thought it was just me not installing properly. The next time it tore one of the straps loose, pulled the velcro from the roll bar and shredded the rear of the top (I didn't catch it quite as soon as the previous time). It does only take a couple of minutes to put the top on and take it off so I guess that would be the best practice, but I don't want to mess with it every time so I guess I will have to go with a hard top.

product_title: Photo Blocker Spray
review_body: Just received a ticket in the mail with a lovely clear photo of my tag #.  I had sprayed 2 thorough coats AND used the PhotoShield cover to boot.   What a rip off!!!  I should have read the reviews first!!! Wish there were a zero star option.

product_title: AGT Xenon Universal replacement SLIM HID Digital ballast (AC-SLM-BLST)
review_body: 2 thumbs up, very nice slim and small ballast will do business with Clear View again I would recommend product to anyone wanting a ballast replacement, fast shipping

product_title: Attwood Centric Contour Seat, Blue/White
review_headline: Great seats at a great price
review_body: These seats were designed by marine experts to shed water instead of holding a puddle to sit in later.  Comfortable for kids and large adults and everyone in between.  Beautiful color.      The vendor I got them from had the best customer service I have ever received, resolved a minor problem instantly.

product_title: For 98-01 FORD EXPLORER TAIL LIGHT LH (DRIVER SIDE) SUV (1998 98 1999 99 2000 00 2001 01) 11-5130-01 F87Z13405AC
review_body: some one hit and cracked my tail light at some point, which eventually filled with water and made my reverse light go out. so i ordered this new one to replace it. i had thought that it was all one whole assembly (lights and all included and it would be a plug and go, but it's just the plastic shell. it wasn't a big deal though, i just undid the 2 screws at the top of the light, pulled the old one off and the 3 bulb sockets just twist out. turned out great

product_title: TYC Mercury Grand Marquis Replacement Parking/Signal/Side Marker Lamp Assembly
review_headline: Shipped fast and a great product fit
review_body: This assembly came in a fast manner the packaging was great and most of all the light assembly fit my 2006 Mercury Grand Marquis LS with no hassles.

product_title: Trillium Worldwide Car Cozy 2 12-Volt Heated Travel Blanket
review_body: I was in search of a blanket that could cover the kids in the back seat. After searching, I chose this one. It fits my needs beautifully. The kids stay warm during freezing weather while I can stay at a comfortable temp up front. A soft, cozy blanket that feels so nice on chilled fingers. It heats up in minutes(3) and covers two car seats that are next to each other. The 'on' switch is a choice of 30 or 45 min heat time. Which may be good.. could never forget to turn it off on a long trip. Non machine washable, but not concerned. I would recommend this blanket if you live in frigid weather. Don't need to crank the heat to unbearable levels just to get a bit of heat back to the kids.

product_title: PIAA 10926 9006 (HB4) Intense White - 9006 51W=115W Xtra Intense White Bulb, Twin Pack
review_headline: Brightest light for the $ that I've found.
review_body: This is the brightest light for the money that I've found. I was a little hesitant at first because the price was so low, but it brought my wife's Toyota Sienna to a new realm of night driving. Very impressed. Would recomend to anyone.

product_title: K&N Performance Cold Air Intake Kit
review_body: Installed on my 2004 Ford F150 p/up.  Easy install, took about 2 hours.  No problems.  Probably adds 4 or 5 horsepower, and it sounds awesome.  Only downside is it's a bit loud when crusing on the highway.

product_title: Advanced Tool Design Model  ATD-1351  5 Piece Adapter Set
review_headline: How Did I Live Without This So Long?
review_body: Had this for months now. I swear I use it every single week. My motorcycles & scooters drive me nuts getting to tight places and this set is vastly better quality than I ever would have imagined! Also, such a very \\\\\COMPLETE\\\\\" kit. Trust me, you buy this and you will find yourself wondering how you ever lived without it. You will also find the quality just fine, and will never again find yourself looking for a way to get the job done....a rare (for me) 5 stars without reservation."

product_title: Hopkins 47205 4 Wire Flat Adapter
review_body: This is a universal and easy plug to adapt and convert a 4 pin plug to a 7 pin plug. Very quick install with the universal bracket I also bought. 10 minutes and I was done. Now I can go from 4 pin to 7 pin in seconds.

product_title: CG Lock
review_headline: Works good, but breaks for no reason
review_body:
I am now on my third CG lock that has failed. It works great, for about two weeks in my Wrangler. The lever pops off leaving it useless. First one was warrantied, they said \\\\\this is a rare thing!\\\\\". Yea well that one broke two weeks later. Got warrantied....that one broke two weeks later. I've tried expoying and red loctite for the lever, neither hold up.

I love it, when it works, but that is not very often.."

product_title: Bulldog RS 1300 Remote Starter w/Keyless Entry and Alarm System
review_headline: Do I really want this product in my car?
review_body: I have read several reviews from many websites. Tech support is almost nonexistent at best. With all the hassles described for installation combined with negative feedback from local auto parts stores, I believe it would better to shop for another brand of product.

product_title: Emgo Portable Travel Trunk - Black
review_body: Mounted easily and seems to be durable. Great for around town and instant removal a plus when riding off road.

product_title: Camp Chef Del Rio Gas Fire Pit
review_body: We needed a fire pit which could set on a screened deck with a covering, so a wood-burning firepit wouldn't suffice.  This gas unit is quite nice.  It arrived guickly, was a breeze to get connected, and looks really nice in the area.  It puts out a lot of heat which is adjustable with the valve on the inlet.  Only disadvantage is that it doesn't have a built in pilot light or sparker for ignition, but a long grill lighter works just fine.  We have now had a local gas company install large cyliners by the side of the house and run a line under the deck so the installation looks much cleaner and avoids having to worry about refilling the 20lb grill tanks.    Overall a really nice unit, at a reasonable price.

product_title: IceDozer Plus Ergonomic Ice Scraper
review_headline: Hard on your back, handle can leave blisters
review_body:
The blade itself works well, but the handle isn't designed well for traditional ice scraping. I created a new start-up company during a recent snow storm, we remove excess snow and ice from roofs, driveways, and sidewalks.

Knowing shovels would not be adequate, I purchased 15 IceDozers in hope for more efficient workmen. I came to realize my men were coming to work with sore backs, blistered hands and shattered egos. My start up is now losing money because of this faulty product, it should really only be recommended for small houses.

If you still wish to try your luck with this product, there is a modification that can increase your productivity. I found that taping/gluing a broom handle to the IceDozer will allow you more leverage while while scraping. None the less, be sure to know an accurate square footage estimate of the property you will be working on. I would not use this on a house larger than 3,000 square feet, or 4,500 if you are using the broom handle modification.

review_body: Great inserts! Works perfect with button covers!

product_title: Car Window Shade (2 Pack) by Rolling Over, Car Sun Shade Blocks 99% of UV Rays! BEST Quality w/ Lifetime Warranty. Attaches Easy & Protects Your Baby, BONUS Storage Bag, Best Value Side Window Shades
review_headline: These Window Car Shades by Rolling Over are Wonderful!
review_body:
These Window Car Sun Shades by Rolling Over are Wonderful!
Each 18 1/2" x 12" Car Shade features a Static Cling Outer Layer which secures them to the window without suction cups or any type of fasteners.
The Inner Layer is a Fine Mesh Material which not only blocks out 99% of UV rays, but allows Both the Back Seat Passenger and the Driver to have a very good view of whatever is on the outsides of the windows.
They offer a Well Sewn Hem around the Entire Perimeter of the Shade and Fold Back Up to fit into the Handy 7 1/2" Storage Pouch which Rolling Over Includes. A simple twist of the wrist and they are ready to be put in the Storage Pouch!
Installation was Super Simple.
All I had to do was position them on the window and run my hand over the shade to secure it!
I love that the Static Cling Material produced very few air bubbles for me to have to smooth out during installation, unlike other cling style window shades that took forever to get bubble free.
They Stayed In Place Extremely Well, in spite of the hot Florida sun beating down on them.
Best of all, when I want to remove them, they leave my windows exactly as they were before I put them on!
I also appreciate that Rolling Over packages these Car Window Shades and their Storage Pouch in an 8" x 6.7" x 1" Recyclable, Sturdy Plastic Bag with Snap Closures which can be re-used for long term storage.
I received mine at a reduced cost in exchange for testing and review and I am giving them an A+++ Recommendation!

review_headline: I don't know how I have gone this long without this car trash bag!
review_body: I seriously LOVE this! My husband works 2 hours away and drives every day. I have severe OCD and can not stand a mess. Weekends, when we take his car since it is more family friendly than my truck, I lose my mind over how trashed his car is! I was given an opportunity to purchase this at a steep discount to test it out and share my opinion of the product, I now need to go back and purchase a second one at full price for my own truck! It is perfect to attach to the back of the passenger seat with the easy to use, yet strong clips! The inside is perfect for keeping items or even to put a trash bag in and actually use it AS a car trash bag. There is a nice pouch at the bottom that perfectly fits a box of kleenex. (Huge plus for moms on the go! My son is always asking for a tissue and now he can reach over and grab one and not distract me from driving!) Their is also a nice side pocket that can hold a roll of trash bags or even work as a drink bottle holder for someone in the back seat. The drawstring top is perfect to keep everything put. I don't know how I have gone this long without this organizer.

product_title: Baltic Amber Teething Necklace For Babies (Unisex) (Cognac) - Anti Flammatory, Drooling & Teething Pain Reduce Properties - Natural Certificated Oval Baltic Jewelry with the Highest Quality Guaranteed
review_body:
Having a baby does not come with a manual. It doesn’t matter how many that you have they are never an exact science. However, you learn a few tricks along the way to help yourself cope with several situations. That is where the Baltic Amber necklace comes in.

A fussy child is hard to deal with at times. This is true if it is because of colic, overly crying, or teething babies. This amber necklace is one that help with everything, or it seems so. One of my babies drooled all the time. Drooling became very annoying after a short period of time, but nothing compared to the teething cries. Your baby will receive wonderful benefits from this necklace. The pain reduction from teething, it has anti-flammatory benefits.

This is a necklace that should be on every baby’s neck. It is a beautiful dark rich amber color. Each of the beads are separate from the other ones. That way if one amber pieces falls off, then they all will not fall off. This was a great feature because even if my child was rough on it, I didn’t fear all the pieces falling off if something happens. This is a necklace that every baby should be wearing. It will not only make the baby happy, but it will also make all mommies happy too.

product_title: PRIMO Folding Potty with Handles, White granite
review_body: Good seat for the price and for what it is.  I had low expectations for this product, and was thus pleasantly surprised.  I like that it folds up relatively small. Dirty sides fold together.  My daughter is around 30 pounds, and I have no issues with bending or lack of support. It seems sturdy.  The little handles on the front are great. We've used it in a number of public restrooms and its helpful. When just starting out potty training, she wasn't quite sure how to balance on larger seats and this helps.  Its also helpful if she's out with my husband and has to use a men's public restroom.  It keeps her little hands off especially dirty toilets.  My main issue is that because of how it sits on larger seats, she is positioned very near the front of the toilet.  Often times when urinating, the urine misses the toilet all together.  However, we have the same issue balancing on a large toilet without this seat, too.  Its just because little legs are only so small and the child just can't sit further back.  Overall, I'm happy with the quality. We don't use it all the time, but for $9 its very helpful to have.  Its especially nice if your child is just learning to use the toilet.

product_title: Motorola MBP27T 2.4 GHz Digital Video Baby Monitor with 2.4-Inch Color LCD and Touchless Thermometer for Baby and Liquids
review_body: I have to confess - I am not using this product as a baby monitor.  I am using it to monitor the area outside of my front door so I can see who is there.  It does an excellent job of this and based on the testing I did, I'd say it would make an excellent baby monitor as well.    The product comes sturdily packaged with instructions that I feel are comprehensive and clearly written. There are two power packs, one for the camera and one for the monitor, each having a different sized plug so you can't mix them up.  After charging the monitor, I placed the camera in the corner of the kitchen where it wasn't easily seen.  I waited for my wife to go in there. I could clearly see her, and at that time I started talking to her from another room, using the monitor's built-in microphone, with the sound coming out of the camera's speaker.    She was startled and was looking around wondering where I was, haha.    The built in microphone on the camera also lets you hear what is going on in the room. The audio quality isn't hi-fi but it is acceptable and serves the purpose.  I'm happy with the resolution on the monitor.  Again, it isn't the sharpest but you can definitely see what is going on in the room with enough detail, and in color.  The infrared night vision also works very well - it shows me black and white images of the objects in a darkened room.    The pan and tilt controls work well, too. I can adjust the camera quite a bit to the left, right, up and down, certainly enough for the purposes of monitoring a baby and also of seeing who is out on the porch. I like having that flexibility.    The monitor has a couple of thermometer functions, one for reading liquid or surface temperatures, and one for reading body temperatures by pointing it at the forehead from about a 1/2\\\\\ to an inch away. I found that both of them are quite accurate. The surface reading matched the thermometer in the room, and a reading of my own temperature showed 98 degrees.    All in all, this is a very useful product. Like I said, I am not using it for the intended purpose since I don't have a baby, but the concept is the same for monitoring what is going on outside our front door or for monitoring the activity in a room. The product seems of good quality, it is easy to set up and works like it is supposed to."

product_title: Aden + Anais Bamboo Musy Mate Maxi - Koala (Azure)
review_headline: A+A has amazing customer service-- but this product is a lemon.
review_body:
I love A+A products. We have lots of swaddles, a couple dream blankets, and lots of bibs, and were REALLY looking forward to the musy mates. Unfortunately, this one is just terrible. They are REALLY cute-- at least my son thinks so. When he saw this he squealed and played with it excitedly for about 5 minutes (which is about the extent of his attention span right now). However, by that point one of the seams around the nose had already frayed (at least the top layer-- there are a couple layers of fabric, so no stuffing was showing). The bear itself is REALLY stiff-- almost like it is intended more for display than for actual use, though I know this is not the case. I know the company has gone through extensive testing to try to improve this product, but unfortunately the material they are using just isn't suited for this purpose.

For the sake of full disclosure, I will say that I did not pay for this product. Last year I purchased a Kangaroo musy mate at a local boutique for my son, but when I went on the A+A site to find care instructions I didn't see the item. I did some googling, found out that people were having lots of issues with the musy mates falling apart, and e-mailed A+A asking if they had any safety recalls out on the product. They said they didn't, so I let my son have it, and it's held up fairly well for several months.

Last week, someone from A+A contacted me, citing my previous inquiry about the musy mates and acknowledging that there were durability issues with the original product, but offering to send me a free item of my choice since they claimed to have made substantial improvements. (As I said, my original item turned out to be fine, so they did this not because it was unsafe but because they wanted to prove that their new product was improved.) My son loves this bear, but unfortunately I have to say that our experience with this bear was far worse than our original kangaroo musy, which is still going strong.

I really hope they either fix this issue or pull this product, as I'm sure it's costing them a ridiculous amount of money and they really are an excellent company.really hope they either fix this issue or pull this product, as I'm sure it's costing them a ridiculous amount of money and they really are an excellent company.

product_title: Lamaze Play & Grow Take Along Toy, Firefly
review_headline: Love This Toy and My Nephew Enough to Change It
review_body: I love this toy but it isn't safe for a child who puts everything in it's mouth....mainly birth to 2 years old.  When I received it I looked it over and found some things I knew I could fix.  The first thing I did was remove the white ring from the top of the toy.  It has an opening where a child can easily get their fingers or nose caught in it and it would pinch.  I trimmed the piece of cloth, the tab, that was linked to the ring, right down to the head and it's fine.  I then examined the wings and discovered 4 strips of stiff plastic with sharp edges that can poke through the material on the wings and would seriously hurt a child's gums.  I clipped the stitching close to the body of the toy and made 4 slits in the fabric of the wings just large enough to remove the plastic strips.  I then restitched the wings tightly to the body so that the slits won't show and the wings hold.  I then stitched around the flap that goes over the mirror because the mirror isn't soft and wouldn't be comfortable if the child bit down on it.  There's still a bit of it shining through, enough to peak the interest of the child.  The outside coating of the mirror is soft and can easily be peeled off and I wouldn't want a child sucking on it or chewing it, especially a child who's teething.  The eyes are cloth which is great and the red teething medallion tucked into the pocket is large enough so as not to pose a choking hazard to a child and is soft enough to make their gums feel better while they're teething.  The hard ball in the head that houses the rattlers is protected enough to be safe for a child.  The squeaker in the lower left hand wing is soft enough so if a child bites down on it it will be comfortable and where it squeaks they'll probably do it often.  I left the rings at the base of the firefly intact since, although they're not as soft as the teething ring, they can't pose a problem to a child.  Now that I've made these adjustments to this toy I feel comfortable giving it to my little nephew.  The colors are phenomenal, the expression on the firefly is delightful and I really love this toy and my nephew, which is why I made these adjustments.  It was worth the effort.  I have also decided to add a piece of colorful cloth over the piece of metal that serves as a mirror.

product_title: Fisher-Price Healthy Care Booster Seat, Green/Blue
review_body:
We lived in a small space when we got this booster seat. We purchased it when our son was about 6 months old, and ready to start eating solids. At a year old, he still fits in it comfortably, and my 2 year old has even used it a few times. I would never ever buy another bulky high chair after using this booster.

Pros-
-portable
-space saving!!
-easily straps on to different chairs
-very easy to clean out the tray and seat
-fit my 6 month or 2 year olds.
-easy to remove/put on tray

Cons-
-the nylon straps are a bit hard to clean
-things like ravioli have temporarily stained the tray (comes off in a few washes)

With just 2 bad/inconvenient issues, I would certainly buy this booster/high chair again. I've even talked a few of my friends into buying it instead of the bulky seats, and they love it too.

product_title: Playtex Flip Top Snacker with Twist 'N Click, Color may vary
review_body: The cup does prevent some spills of snacks. Smaller snacks still fall out if tipped over or dropped. Larger snacks are a bit tricky to get out and can cause some frustration. The lid is too difficult to quickly put on & off, so we don't use it. It has been best for our daughter when she likes to walk around with her snacks or take them out on the patio. If you can get it for under $5 than it should be worth the money.

product_title: Stork Craft Custom Hoop Glider and Ottoman
review_body: I received my glider rocker around 2 weeks ago and I love it!  It is well built, quiet, comfortable and easy to put together!  The only reason that I did not give it 5 stars was because the back is a little low.  I'm 5'8" and when I'm sitting in the chair the back comes to about the top of my shoulder, just a little too low for me to comfortably rest my head back while feeding or rocking my little one.  I did find that a small throw pillow tucked in behind my head remedies this nicely though and makes me completely comfy!  I don't think you'll be disappointed if you buy this chair.  :)

product_title: Evenflo Delux Developmental Activity Center, Circus (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
review_body: My twin baby girls love this exersaucer, which is fantastic, because it provides a place for them to play safely and independently. It has done wonders for one of my girls, who loves to be held, but who will sit and bounce and spin in this toy to her heart's content. Both girls are fascinated by the toys and they have learned to appreciate them in different ways as they have gotten older. This exersaucer is sturdy and easy to clean. It has grown with my girls from the shortest setting at 5 months to the tallest setting at 10 months. I would highly recommend it. It's a very engaging toy, and the babies can control how stimulating it is by either sitting still and playing with one toy, or jumping and spinning with excitement.

product_title: Itzbeen Pocket Nanny Baby Care Timer
review_headline: Saved my life with baby #2, Buying again for #3!
review_body:
I picked one of these up for my second child, wondering if I would *really* need it, since I fed, diapered, and napped my first completely on-demand for the first six months. However, I knew that with two little munchkins, that exhausting game was not going to work, and hoped this timer would help us to establish a better routine. As it turns out, baby #2 was a high-needs newborn, complete with a fun little colostomy. When I say that the Itzbeen baby timer saved my life, I'm not sure this is an exaggeration. Those first few months home with him (and a two year old) were the hardest of my entire life and this timer helped me to understand his rhythms so that I could work with them to establish a routine that worked for all of us. I used the \\\\\90 Minute Miracle\\\\\" principles to help him sleep and the timer really helped me to keep track of his waking and sleeping. My only complaint is that I wish it had a memory so I could go back and see the last, say, 5 or 6 time intervals for each button. However, I guess that's what a good old fashioned pen and paper are for.
Oh, and my other complaint... Child #2 became completely fascinated with this little gadget. One day shortly after his first birthday, he got a hold of it, and while my daughter was bathing, he decided to see what would happen if he chucked it in the bathtub. Our beloved Itzbeen did not survive this unfortunate event. Now that our third child is on the way, I plan to purchase another of these and hope it does not suffer the same fate as its late cousin."

product_title: FridaBaby NoseFrida The SnotSucker Nasal Aspirator
review_body: I started using this product on my son when he was a newborn.  I like that you can adjust the suction with your breath so that you are not sucking too hard and damaging baby's membranes.  Now that my little one is 6 months (though he still does not like the sensation), he knows that it will provide relief and is notably more contented after I use it.  Of course, my family and friends are totally grossed out by the idea of sucking snot, but the mommy in me says no big deal.  It's actually simple and ingenius, and I wouldn't use anything else.  Don't forget to get an extra pack of filters.  They last quite a while if you use the product conservatively (I do not use it unless baby is having difficulty breathing).

product_title: Summer Infant SwaddlePod, Pink Ruffle, Newborn
review_body: These things are amazing.  I have never tried the Woombie brand, but I don't know how they could be worth 3x the price of the SwaddlePod.  We use these at night and my newborn sleeps for hours between feedings without being able to startle herself awake.  She loves these things and my only regret is I didn't find them earlier.  My wife loves them for feeding time as well because it keeps her arms and hands contained and out of the way.

product_title: B kids Music Mates Smart Phone
review_headline: This is nothing like a \smart phone\""
review_body: Very disappointed in this phone.  My son loves to play with phones and can actually move things around on my smart phone.  Knowing this is a toy, I was still under the impression that they could move the screen with their fingers and play music.  The image itself stays the same, it is hard to press and make the monkey move...which by the way, barely moves at all!  You have to put the phone up close to your ear to hear the music and there is no volume control.  The music on the phone stops very quick and you have to keep pushing the 1 button on the phone.  We have lots of toy phones and this one is not worth having - I wish I could return it but we tore the packaging to get it open.

product_title: Media Carousel
review_headline: Fits _LOTS_ of books of all sizes!
review_body: We had books lined up along 3 or 4 feet of base boards, piled up all around our rocking chair and on top of a small lamp table.  We were pleasantly surprised that this carousel shelf held them all and more!  We plan to buy second for our other child's room.  Ours has never tipped and is easy enough for our 3-year-old daughter to turn even though it is heavily laden.

product_title: Serta Nightstar Extra Firm Crib Mattress (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
review_headline: Didn't buy due to coil count...
review_body: I just want to say that I didn't end up buying this mattress, so I don't have a personal review of it. My husband and I were looking at buying it, but we searched all over the internet for a coil count for it and couldn't find it (though we found lots of people asking the same thing). My husband e-mail Lajobi (the manufacturer), and they got back to us several days later and said that mattress had only 117 coils. I know coil count isn't necessarily indicative of a good or bad mattress but that combined with a lot of reviews saying the mattress was too soft and/or sagged quickly was enough to make us move on... Just wanted to let you know in case you had the same question!

product_title: Fisher-Price Zen Collection Cradle Swing
review_body:
I love this swing and so does my newborn son! He naps in it all the time which allows me to get some stuff done around the house. The removable seat is a great feature because you can just pick it up and move from room to room with ease. It's nice that you can choose between side-to-side or head-to-toe rocking motion just in case your child has a preference. Not only is it functional, it's beautiful for either gender and matches nicely with furniture. The only problem that I had with it was the top music button became dislodged when I pressed on it with little force...so beware...luckily, my husband was able to repair this. Other than that, I love this beautiful swing and highly recommend it!!!!

PROs:
-beautiful
-two options of swinging motion (side-to-side or head-to-toe)
-music is nice
-seat is portable
-attached blanket is nice
-easy to assemble
-entire swing is easy to move from room to room

CONs:
-music buttons easily dislodge with minimal force

product_title: Gummygoods Nightlight - Yellow Gummy Bear
review_headline: \new' Bear package recieved open and defective
review_body: Hello I purchased the Gummy Lamps nightlight as a rush order early christmas present for a visiting niece.  The Bear was advertised as \\\"New\\\\\" when i opened the box the packaging of the bear has already been opened..and then when i put the batteries in the lamp did not work. the same for plugging it into the computer! I was very upset. I felt this bear was sent knowingly broken. I would not buy a Bear from \\\\\"jailbreak toys\\\\\""

product_title: Baby Cie Monkey Motif Juice Cup
review_body: We have 4 of these and I wish they came in more gender neutral designs (I have 2 boys). They are the perfect size for both my toddler and my 4 yr old.  I also have the bowls which are great quality.

product_title: Vital Baby Press 'n' Pop Mini Freezer Pots, Orange, 1 Ounce
review_body: Love the product! The frozed baby food pops up easily with the silicon on the bottom. Great portion for small feedings.

product_title: Safety 1st Summit Deluxe Booster Baby Car Seat
review_body: I've tried several car seats for my two toddlers, and had issues with each. I finally came to this one. It's a little bulky, a little heavy, and has some quirks when you lean it back. But overall this is a quality seat, and works very well. My boys enjoy the pattern, and seem to be comfy. Also, their heads don't usually fall forward when they fall asleep in this seat, partly because it leans back slightly.

product_title: BABYBJORN Baby Carrier Original
review_headline: Works well -- kid can get hot
review_body: If you're unsure if this is something you will want to use, then buying the original BabyBjorn from Amazon is your best bet -- you'll get a very functional product at a great price compared to Babies R Us or Buy Buy Baby.  We use this product sparingly, but it is very handy in that it allows you to get your hands back and get some work done around that house while keeping your child safe and secure to you.    Our child enjoys being in the harness.  However, he will get hot if we are outside in the summer.  If this is something you are going to use frequently, I would advise purchasing one of the higher-end, breathable models.

product_title: Fisher-Price Precious Planet Snow Globe and Lights Bouncer (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
review_headline: Baby has no complaints, but I have 1
review_body: The only complaint I have about this seat is that the motor that makes the \\\\\snow\\\\\" float around the polar bear is rather loud for such a small device.  My baby doesn't seem to notice, so that's all that really matters."

product_title: Dr. Brown's 3 Pack BPA Free Polypropylene Bottles 8 ounce
review_body: I used these and the avent bottles primarily.  While Dr. Brown's bottles do require more cleaning I like the bottles.  My son didn't have problems with colic so I don't know whether it's due to the bottles or not.  I don't know about the labeling coming off in the dishwasher since I usually wash my bottles by hand.  I do like the slenderness of the 4 oz. especially.  They are easy for my son to hold.  The 8oz. is thicker and a little more of a handful for my son but he manages.

product_title: Fisher-Price Precious Planet Whale of a Tub
review_headline: But, the baby doesn't know it's a whale...
review_body: This has been a solid product and would recommend for other parents. I have not tried other types of baby-baths, but have no complaints at all about this one. The cup (fish) that comes with the tub is a great tool; the baby loves getting the water sprinkled on his head like a shower. The reclining position and shape of the tub seems natural and comfortable for him. I like that the inner lining of the tub is cushioned with foam-like material (and not hard plastic). Draining the water out of the tub is easy. All-around, it is just a very good choice.

product_title: Potty Time Potty Watch - Blue
review_body: We purchased this watch after watching a family member using it to assist in potty training her son.  Our son loved it and it worked great, twice.  Turns out this watch has a high susceptibility to water.  If you are teaching your children to wash their hands after they use the potty, then you will likely have a low lifespan on this product.  It was great two times, but the product design needs to be modified a bit.

product_title: Graphique Home Decal
review_body: I bought this for my daughter to assist her in decorating the nursery.  She loved it! It was easy placement and found that she could remove them easily and reposition them. She wants to buy more for other rooms in her home.

product_title: Itzy Ritzy Travel Happens Large Sealed Wet Bag with Adjustable Handle
review_headline: Really cute, but really small & could use a handle
review_body: I guess I should have read the dimensions more carefully, because this bag is really pretty small.  I also didn't think about it at the time, but it could use a handle as well.  I guess it's just meant for use inside a purse/diaper bag. It will hold one cloth diaper (maybe two if you stuff them in). It is really cute and well-made though!

product_title: Sugar Booger Mini Bib Gift Set
review_headline: Cute but not as easy to clean as other vinyl bibs
review_body: I bought these for meal times so my daughter wouldn't stain her cloth bibs and I wouldn't add to the mound of laundry with every feeding.    The vinyl part is great, wipes clean easy. The problem is the trim around the bib. It is not vinyl, but cotton. Any food that gets on the trim can't be wiped away as easily as it can be on the vinyl part. I end up having to put these in the washer constantly.    If you want something you can wipe off and reuse several times, I would recommend the Bumkins. Those are fabulous.    These are adorable if you are looking for cuteness over functionality though.

product_title: Infantino Barn Shape Sorter (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
review_body: I got this item for my little girl's first birthday. She is now 16 months and she still can't do the top sorting part. The shapes of the letters make it so it is really hard to do it. You have to get the letter in just the right position to make it go in. She can't do it and ends up getting very frustrated and angry each time she plays with this toy. She likes that she can stuff things inside it, but even that is hard. The door to the barn does not open easily. She can't do it on her own, and brings it to my about every 2 minutes for me to open it again.

product_title: Vulli Sophie la Girafe
review_body: DS loves his Sophie and is very vocal while gnawing on her.  The material is good but like others have said it's very comparable to a dog toy...and it's even been mistaken for one!!  The legs are too long in my opinion and DS has gagged on them when he sticks Sophie in his mouth too far.  I really dislike the smell of the rubber but I guess that comes with a rubber toy.  Overall I'm glad MIL gave us this as a gift but no way would I have spent almost $20 on it.  Just sayin.

product_title: AVENT Express II Microwave Steam Sterilizer
review_body: Really love this simple to use steam sterilizer. It fits lots of things, including items that are not Avent related i.e. my Dr. Brown's bottles and parts, and only takes 2 minutes in my microwave. It really helps save time from having to boil things, and it comes in handy when I don't have enough dishes to start the dishwasher (and run the sanitizer cycle). Could not be happier with this product.

product_title: Baby Einstein Around The World Cradling Bouncer (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
review_body: My baby started enjoying the toys around 2 months.  The vibration makes a huge difference!  He is now 3 months old and smiles at the panda and lion because they have smiles.  He completely ignores the green toy in the middle! I'm sure later when he can reach and grab them he will be interested in it.

product_title: Jeep 2-in-1 Safety Harness (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
review_headline: Great for the Price & On the go.
review_body: For the price of this item is it a true joy.  My 2 year old gets just enough freedom to enjoy walking around with the safety of being close by.  It's small enough to fit in my purse or small diaper bag.  It is easy for them to get it a bit tangled when the walk in circles :)  but other than that it was a great buy.

product_title: Chicco Cortina Together Double Stroller - Romantic
review_body: I was very excited when I heard Chicco was finally coming out with a double stroller. I was initially against any double stroller; I just didn't want to mess with it. But when our daughter was 2.5 years and our son was four months we were taking a month long trip abroad, and I knew we wouldn't be able to corral both kids without one. The Cortina Together worked wonderfully for what we needed. We already had a Chicco car seat and Trevi, so we knew we liked Chicco. And I wanted both kids to be able to sit comfortably. I knew a sit and stand would be lighter, but didn't want my two-year-old to have to stand or sit on an uncomfortable, tiny seat all the time. After hauling this thing all over Europe, here is why I love this stroller:    You can easily snap the Chicco car seat into it. I love that you can place it in the front seat or back seat. When we want more control of our toddler, we place her in the back and baby in the front. But when we are just enjoying a walk she loves sitting in the front to see better, and hop in and out on her own. It is also a great feature that the rear seat fully reclines. This is nice for a napping toddler, and makes a great bassinet for a sleeping baby.    The basket underneath is very large and very accessible. Adding the zippered front is a huge help, to be able to access things even when the back seat is fully reclined. I was able to easily carry diaper bags, luggage, groceries, etc in that thing. I also like that the basket stretches in front of the rear seat. If our daughter dropped anything, it caught it, which is nice when you are running to catch a train, and not keeping track of everything!    The canopies work well. They aren't large, but the fact that they adjust so easily means you can keep your children covered from rain, or keep the sun out of their eyes, no matter what angle. I also love having the two cup holders for mom and dad, as well as the two cup holders on the front seat. A con, however, is that there are no cupholders for the back seat. And the two cup holders on the front can be switched which is nice. But, if you have them turned out, you can't fold the canopy up when the stroller is folded, and if you have them turned in, you can't fold the front seat down to accommodate the car seat. But this is super easy to adjust. The seats move very easily as well - one hand adjustment. The brakes and wheel locks are great and easy too.    Even with its large size, the stroller turns on a dime. The handle bar adjusts easily for pushers of different heights. Sometimes we found the stroller can be a little tricky to fold up - the lock only requires one hand, but you have to maneuver the stroller just right to get it to collapse on itself. When folded up, though, it's not too huge - it easily fits in our Honda CVR, no problem. It's great for on the go, easy to set up - no adjustments needed.    The stroller proved to be very durable - considering we hauled it on and off planes and trains, as well as up and down cobblestone streets and off-road. Like others have said, it is heavy, but it is a double stroller, that's what you get. It is lighter than many options, though. My close friend has a Graco double, and she is super jealous of our Chicco! One other negative is there's no handle or really great place to grab the stroller to carry it when it's folded up. The feature that allows it to still roll when folded is nice, but obviously doesn't help when you are going up stairs.    I truly love this stroller, and I would highly recommend it to anyone. Coming from one mommy who didn't especially want a double, is only five feet tall (and not very strong!), but realized she needed it, I would never use another double stroller. This is the way to go!

product_title: Medela One-Piece Breastshield w/ Valve and Membrane
review_body: I ordered these parts to use with my Medela Pump-In-Style so I wouldn't have to wash parts so many times at work.  My particular model came with the Soft Fit shields, and I thought I would try the classic style that is all hard plastic to see if there was any difference in my milk production.    I was never able to tell a difference, even positive or negative, as to the efficiency of the shields in the extraction of milk.  These were a bit less comfortable than the Soft Fit, but were not painful or unpleasant by any means.  I would encourage any working mother to order a few extra sets of shields to make pumping at work easier.

product_title: Stork Craft Custom Hoop Glider and Ottoman
review_body: I purchased this chair in May 2010 right before my son was born. I bought it because it seemed like such a good price and it was the same color and brand as my changing table.  Well first off we had a hard time putting it together because a couple of the assembly holes were drilled wrong and didn't match up.  Luckily my husband is a handy guy and just drilled new holes to make it work.  My biggest complaint is it squeaks! I have to oil it at least once a week.  Of course it always starts squeaking when I am nursing and rocking my baby to sleep.  I wish I would have spent more money for a better quality chair.

product_title: Delta Children Liberty Toddler Bed
review_headline: Sturdy bed, a bit irksome to assemble
review_body: This is a very sturdy product that will definitely hold a toddler and 200-lb parent for bedtime reading. The color is nice and the quality good. However, assembly was difficult for an individual because the slats slide out easily while installing. The process took 45 minutes, but would have been a half hour or less for two people. Overall good investment.

product_title: Aosom Baby Kids Wooden Playpen Room Divider 8 Panel
review_body: I bought this for my baby for Chritmas she was 8 months at the time and  pulling up to standing position. After about a month it cracked. She was standing up leaning against it and it cracked. I replaced the panel but by feb two other panels cracked as well. This product is not sturdy at all. After all my baby was only 15lbs at the time an is now only 18 lbs.  I would like to return this product and get back my money.

product_title: Kidco Peapod Travel Bed in Lime
review_body: We just got back from an extended trip, and we used our pea pod every night for our 6 month old.  She slept well in it, and it worked great in every place we stayed.  I am particularly pleased with how well it folds up and how small it stores.  After carrying around a large travel bed for my other children these past few years ... I am very thankful for a better travel bed sleeping solution.

product_title: Sassy Insulated Feeding Pots, Colors May Vary (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
review_body: We've used these several times on short journeys and on each occasion they've leaked. Perhaps this is a design flaw in our set of feeding pots but a disappointing purchase overall.

product_title: Sassy Baby's Nursery Rhyme Books
review_body: This product is simple yet sweet...cute story and mutifunctional as a teether and great tactile features.  Mom and baby will both enjoy it!

product_title: Basic Comfort Handy's Plus Pad
review_body: I bought two pads for my toddler and have been using them for a year. They work fine and save her mattress from many bed wets. However the surface area of the pad is not very big and my toddler likes to turn and flip around when sleeping. Hence we put two pads on the bed and that solves the problem. My only complaint is the folding area could be longer. My toddler's mattress was very thick and the pads would shift position as the cloth that is folded underneath the mattress is very little.

product_title: Oakland Raiders 23-pc. Feeding Set
review_body: Yeah, you could get cheaper plates at a discount store, but they would not be Awesome Raiders plates. The set is also nice because everything has a lid. So if you are taking a childs meal to go, or putting something they refused to finish back in the fridge, you are covered. (forgive the pun.)

product_title: Podee Baby Bottle Tube and Nipple Replacements
review_body: This product is a real life saver for feeding multiples. I use this for one twin while the other one is breastfeeding.  Very handy and my girls love them. They can eat on the go easily and less mess. The only drawback is that the nipples wear out quickly and you cannot buy just replacement nipples. You have to buy kits that include nipples and tubes and i have more tubes then podee's. But i love this product.

product_title: Cheeky Monkey Pac Back
review_body: Was useful when traveling solo with my 2 kids and 2 carseats.  One carseat was for an infant and could be placed in the stroller.  I used the pac back for the second, larger carseat.  So one baby and carseat in the stroller and the second carseat on my back while my 2.5 year old toddler walked.  Made the airport experience easier.  Downside was that it started tearing slightly after 4 flights.      No reflection on the product, but if you're carrying a large car seat in the pac back, like I was, you had to walk a very straight line to get down the aisle of the airplane without bumping the seated passengers.

product_title: Ultimate Receiving Blanket
review_headline: The best blanket for your baby
review_body: I first purchased this blanket for our daughter when she was 3 months old.  My baby girl loves being swaddled and this is the only way she will fall asleep.  She is now 6 months old and we are still able to swaddle her due to this blanket.  I love this blanket and recommend this to any parent that plans on swaddling their babies.  I now give this as baby shower presents.  It is the best!!!!!

product_title: Conair Styling Essentials Shower Cap - 1 Assorted Pattern
review_body: Great item!

product_title: Ardell DuraLash Naturals Flare Individual Lashes, Short Black 56 ea
review_body: This is a super good deal for these lashes and it was delivered extremely quick! I can't find short lashed anywhere and certainly not for this price! These go quite a long ways if you glue a few together and reuse them.

product_title: Old Spice Wild Collection Hawkridge Scent Body Wash
review_body: excellent product, well priced.  Hard to find in the marketplace.

product_title: Shower Seal
review_body: It's not the same quality as other's I have used. Maybe that's why it has a lower price

product_title: Ben Nye Luxury Powders - Banana 1.5oz
review_body: very chalky, even in summer it feels dry on my skin. ,

product_title: Queen Helene 100% Cocoa Butter Pure Natural Moisturizer Body Lotions

review_body: Great use for applying foundation!

product_title: PUEEN 3D Nail Art Sticker Collection Set D1 - 14 Packs in Different Designs (Over 240 Stickers) 3D Glitter Sparkling Lovely Prints Nail Art Decal Stickers for Cellphones & Nails Decorations-BH000165

product_title: Braun
review_body: good .

product_title: Clairol Natural Instincts Vibrant
review_body: First time I've colored myself, and I can honestly say I'll never have a salon color my hair again! So easy - ten minutes,  love the color, my hair is shiny and smooth after coloring.

product_title: Glitz by Mottos Temporary Metallic Jewelry Tattoos
review_body: I love them.

product_title: John Frieda Root Awakening Conditioner - Dry Hair (3 Pack)
review_body: Note the blurry picture?  That's to disguise the fact that these are tiny travel sizes!  Yes, I thought it seemed to good to be true, but as an extensive online shopper, I've found numbers of amazing deals in the past. This is not.  Basically I paid eight bucks for 3 dollars worth of conditioner.  Good product, but not from this seller.

product_title: PURA D'OR Hair Loss Prevention Premium Organic Argan Oil Shampoo,16 Fluid Ounce (Packaging may vary)
review_body: Great product. Would recommend it.

product_title: Arctic Fox Semi Permanent Hair Dye - 4 Ounce Poseidon #4
review_body:
I've tried this brand twice now at different times it won't take.
I let it sit for 4 hours bc the normal half hour it's supposed to be is BS.

I'm worried about washing it because last time I used this dye, the day after when I washed my hair (and I let the dye sit a bit longer) all the color came out except a tiny bit.

Not only that, but it stains bad and is almost impossible to get off your skin.. and bathtub.
I spent hours cleaning up the mess it made. I haven't had this issue when using other brands.

Another thing is how thick the dye is. It's ridiculous.

product_title: Anastasia Dipbrow Pomade
review_body: Amazing.

product_title: Diane Powder Puffs
review_headline: waste of money - would not purchase again
review_body: It is no better than the ones you get in the box with a dusting powder....no more plush .

product_title: YEOUTH Best Anti Aging Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid & Tripeptide 31 Trumps ALL Others. 100% Guaranteed
review_body: Started using this product a couple weeks ago, and so far, I really like it.  Economically priced and seems to get the same good results for aging skin as more expensive Vitamin C products.  Thanks for keeping this great skin product affordable!

product_title: 3D Fiber Lash Mascara 3X Lengthen & Volume Eye Makeup by Long & Luscious - Best Eyelash Extensions or Falsies Look with this Beauty Cosmetics Set 100% ALL NATURAL Fibers Bonus Lash Wand Included
review_headline: I was very impressed by the smoothness of the gel mascara and higher intesity it gave and that the fibers went on easily and did
review_body: I used these with a discount for my opinion and they worked well. I was very impressed by the smoothness of the gel mascara and higher intesity it gave and that the fibers went on easily and didn't get into my eyes. Also the  case it all is in upon arrival was more than what was expecting and the instructions were easy to follow. Even though it was 3 I didn't feel like it was too much or too little for the application I did but felt comfortable with it which is what I want in makeup products and I have sensitive skin and eyes and no reactions from these products!

product_title: Universal Gait Belt - Transfer Belt w/ Handles (Fits up to 58 in.) by Rose Healthcare
review_body: Love it! Sturdy, Easy to Latch and Unlatch, Quick Shipping, Works Great to Help Transfer my Dad From Bed to Wheelchair and Visa Versa.

product_title: RapidLash Eyelash and Eyebrow Serum, 0.1 oz
review_headline: The product was almost empty when received.
review_body: I've been using this product for a couple of years and never had a problem.  The product works great if there is anything in the tube when you get it.  This order, however, the product seems to be empty.  There is enough on the brush when you put it on the first eye, but then you have to swirl it around and around and around to get enough on it for the 2nd eye.  I feel I was short-changed by this vendor.

product_title: Linange No Lye Shea Butter Cream Relaxer Single Application Big Sale!! by LINANGE BEAUTY
review_headline: Not a fun Process but happy with the results
review_body: I have a sensitive scalp and most of the reviews I read leaned towards this product not burning as much as most others. It still burned...a lot! the timer was set to 12 minutes for total time including application and smoothing as per the instructions but had to rinse out at 7. The neutralizing conditioner really works and boy was I happy about that! After rinsing out the relaxer my hair did not feel good at all. I used the conditioner as directed and was not to pleased when I rinsed it out. Then I did the restructuring mask...AMAZING RESULTS! Over all my scalp is fine, looks healthy, no visible burns found or felt.

product_title: Revlon ColorStay Mineral Lipglaze, 0.15-Fluid Ounce
review_body: I love this color, but unfortunately, I have had trouble finding it locally.

product_title: Weleda Citrus Deodorant
review_body: Great low-key fresh fragrance, and it works fine for me (I don't sweat heavily unless it's very warm, but it still works for me then).

product_title: Eco-Dent Gentlefloss Premium Dental Floss, Mint, 100 yards
review_headline: More effective in my tight teeth than Glide, and I'm happy with the natural make.
review_body: My mouth is notorious among the local dental hygenists for being small and having tight spaces.  For years I did not floss at all because I simply could not get the floss my family used in between my teeth.  It was a physical impossibility.  Of course, like so many in my situation, I eventually learned about Glide floss and was happy for that.  So for me, trying any other brand was a real gamble.  But I am so glad I did.  Ecodent leaves my mouth feeling fresh, whereas mint Glide just left my mouth feeling uncomfortably numb and chemically.  It is better for the environment.  And more than that, it has proven to be much better for my teeth.  It is more substantial than Glide but still gets into the tight spaces.  It does a better job in those tight spaces because of being more substantial.  I was always careful to wiggle my Glide around to work the space as much as it could, but I never received as rave a review on my oral care from my hygenist as I did after using EcoDent.  I also like the EcoDent replaceable head toothbrushes.  I know toothbrushes don't waste that much landfill space relative to a lot of our stuff, but it is always nice when you can support a good cause.

product_title: Reach Total Care Plus Whitening Mint Floss, 30 Yard
review_body: This is the only floss she loves

product_title: Sunny Isle Extra Dark Jamaican Black Castor Oil, 8 oz
review_body: Have definitely seen a difference in my hair!

product_title: Alba Botanica Very Emollient, Fragrance Free Mineral Sunscreen SPF 30, 4 Ounce (Packaging May Vary)
review_headline: Works well but it is very thick
review_body: It works well but be aware you will need to really rub it in because it is a thick mineral sunblock.

product_title: Cedarwood (2 fl oz) Best Essential Oil - 2 ounces (59ml)
review_headline: Hoping to find a better option.
review_body: Weak....for those looking for a diluted oil, this is for you.  Not impressed with this brand and will not buy again.  Tried the lavendar and bergamont.... Didn't want to pay doterra prices.  Hoping to find a better option.

product_title: Wet N Wild Tinted Moisturizer. 184A Buff
review_body: Great coverage but a little to thick for my taste.

product_title: Premier Dead Sea Para-pharmaceutical Exfoliating Facial Gel, Brown, 4.25-Fluid Ounce
review_body: Dries out my skin

product_title: Tarte Cosmetics Amazonian Clay 12-Hour Full Coverage Foundation 1.7 fl oz.
review_body: Great product!

product_title: Neutrogena Pure & Free Liquid Daily Sunscreen SPF 50 1.40 oz
review_body:
This is my daily-use sunscreen. Being a follower of the EWG (Environmental working group), I'm aware of how bad can the "regular-sunscreens" chemicals be in long term use. Since I wear sunscreen on my face every single day of the year, I try to stay in the healthier choice.
Besides that, It leaves such a dry touch and long lasting sunscreen. Not oily or dense at all.

product_title: EcoTools Powder Brush
review_body: Best foundation brush that I've ever tried

product_title: 10 Color Makeup Cosmetic Blush Blusher
review_body: Love the palette but shipping took forever!

product_title: Tonsee Fashion Chain Headband Head Shiny Piece Hair Band Tassels Gold
review_body: It came broken beyond repair and took forever to get here. Would not recommend.

product_title: NewGel+ Silicone Gel Sheeting for Scar Management - 5\ x 6\" Sheet Clear (1 per box)"
review_headline: Works VERY WELL for healing scars.
review_body: Yes it works. Someone I love and care for had many scars on her inner arms from "cutting" herself during times of sadness. She got counseling, and stopped cutting, but the scars remained, and some were deep. This NewGel+ gel sheeting for scar management worked wonders on her scars. They have been greatly diminished, only a few of the deepest scars still show, but only faintly. So yes I highly recommend the NewGel+ sheets for healing scars. We did not need the special tape that we bought with it, the gel sheets are self-adhesive and they stayed on. This product was just about a miracle for my loved one.

The new manufacturers are too stupid to realize that people with particular needs and possibly problems bought the old Oilatum.  It was never inexpensive.  Do they not wonder why someone would pay such money for a bar of soap?  The last thing Oilatum fans probably wanted was a change in the formula and a perfume added.  I can't bear the scent of it, so I may never use it.

product_title: Jenna Jameson Heartbreaker Perfume parent
review_headline: If you're looking for your new \go to\" scent, this is it!"
review_body: I ordered this on a whim.  I wasn't specifically shopping for perfume but was looking for a gift for my mother's birthday and thought, "Hmm, maybe I should try a new scent."  When I told my sister, her response was, "Why?  Are you trying to smell like a porn star?"  My answer is this - "If this is what porn stars smell like, sign me up!"  I love this scent.  Not too over the top, sophisticated and understated.  The bottle is a substantial weight, too, with cute heavy metal hearts.  I love to wear this and people do stop me to ask what I have on.  The price was right, the smell is lovely, and I am completely happy.

product_title: Set of 3 ~ Purple ~ Genuine Czech, Etched, Crystal Glass Nail Files Double Sided Small, Medium, Large Pedicure file
review_headline: THEN I took the files out and used the clear side and was amazed at how smoothly and quickly they filed my nails ...
review_body:
When I got this I thought the colored side was the filing side and tried to use it. I thought there was no way I paid for something that couldnt file anything.

THEN I took the files out and used the clear side and was amazed at how smoothly and quickly they filed my nails down. I can file my nails and run them under my teeth and I cant feel any marks. Its smooth as butter.

The color is really nice as well. I am really glad I got these. Maybe now I can curb my nail biting habit

product_title: Clairol Age Defy Expert Collection
review_body: Leaves hair soft and manageable ....... Don't yet know how many washings it will last.....?

product_title: Revlon RV544N6 Tourmaline 1875W Ionic Dryer
review_body: The hair dryer work fine the first two times I used it.  The third time, it was dead.  Thankfully, Amazon's return policy covers this so I was not out the cost of the hair dryer.  Note:  This hair dryer has a "cheap" feel to it.  Hard to describe, but it just doesn't feel like a quality product when you are using it.  I would recommend spending a little more and getting a different brand.

product_title: Shea Butter
review_body: I made face cream out of this shea butter with some jojoba, rose hip, and essential oils.  I've only been using it a short time, but it is very moisturizing. The shea butter has a pleasant smell and is easy to work with.

product_title: Eayon Hair Top Quality 100% Raw Virgin Brazilian Human Hair Deep Wave Hair 3pcs 10\-30\" Natural Color"
review_body: When I initially got the hair I loved it. There were no odors and it was so so soft. After having it in now for almost 2 weeks I am disapointed. In the back it gets matted up and tangles its so annoying because then I have to wear my hair up cause if I wear it down it will get matted. The hair didn't shed at first and I didn't seal because I wanted to test it out but it has begin to shed a lot. The hair was so beautiful in the first week but now it's not so good. I probably won't buy from this company again.

product_title: Emjoi Micro-Pedi Nano Callus Remover
review_body: I really like this callus remover.  My heels were not in great shape and after a couple of days using this, my feet are looking great!!  When I first used it, I thought that the rollers weren't going to be strong enough but they are - just don't press too hard when using it. I bought the refill rollers and I'm glad I did.  I haven't replaced them yet but know that I will have to pretty soon.  This is worth the money.

product_title: ZAQ Dew Multi Color Litemist Aromatherapy Essential Oil Diffuser - 80 ML Capacity
review_body: Love it!!

review_headline: My skin was dull, dry & flakey
review_body: My skin was dull, dry & flakey. I was skeptical but decided to try this. My skin feels AND looks so much better. I'm hoping that it helps with my dark spots too.

product_title: MapofBeauty 28\ Wavy Multi-Color Lolita Cosplay Wig Party Wig"
review_body:
I bought this to wear with a fairy kei outfit, and I was far from disappointed. Despite its price, the wig was a very nice quality (maybe a little on the thin side, but that's all right--my hair naturally puffs out and thicker wigs make it seem like the hair is almost floating off my head) and it looks very nice. I cut it so that it would be more of a match for what I was going for, but it still managed to turn out nicely, since some of the curls/curly texture kept even when it was less than half its original length. The only critique I had was that the bangs seemed a little long, but that seems to be a problem with almost every wig for me, so that might just be a personal issue.
All in all, it stayed nice, even after a long day out (as pictured), and I would almost definitely buy this in different colours.

product_title: Trichloroacetic Acid Solution TCA 30% Chemical Skin Peel
review_body:
I am mixed race so I'm dark toned. I used this product because a year before I received horrible Hyperpigmentation in strange up and down line pattern all over my stomach due to a laser treatment. I used fade cream for a year ...no effect.
So I decided to used tca
I diluted the acid to a lower strength I want to say 20-15% and once a month about I would put it on for as long as I could stand it.. Sometimes layering the product a few times for good penetration. And I used a neutralizer then Neosporin for aftercare keep it out of the sun small dab of Ambys fade cream and then eventually all the marks away. Took 4 applications

product_title: Emjoi AP-9L Epi Slim Cosmetic Hair Remover
review_body: Was worried that this wouldn't work for me as I mostly need it for my face, but wow! I'm impressed. I was also worried I may have to let my goatee grow out a bit before I could effectively grab it to remove it, but I initially used this about twice a week, and now once every week and a half works. The hair seems to grown in softer and lighter as well. It's normally very prickly and coarse. I did get a bit overzealous the first time I used it and had it directly on my throat area for a little too long and it burned me a bit, but it was a quick lesson in how to properly use it. I'm a dark skinned woman in her 30's and have had facial hair growth for as long as I can remember. Daily shaving was just a bummer along with the razor bumps that came with it, nearly a year or laser hair removal treatments were completely ineffective, and this has been the only thing to leave my face completely smooth. So happy with this!!

product_title: Beyond The Zone Colour Mousse Pink
review_headline: The more you wash, the cheaper it looks. Would not recommend.
review_body: I used the magenta BTZ Colour Hair Mousse on my 2 inch roots of Natural Sandy Blonde hair, and Semi-lightened strawberry blonde/faded copper hair dye. I left it on for only 20-30 min and my hair is a complete mess. I would be less bothered if it washed out right away but - Nope! I've used 3 types of shampoo, a dish soap, and now my only hope is a lightening developer. The colour on the first night was nice, but with each shampoo the quality has become cheap looking, and my hair has never felt chalkier. I did a test strand that turned out fine, and I don't know if it was because I used it the first day and the best foam comes out first but the all over head was not a great choice. This would be great for peek-a-boo colour strips but the fading is so nasty I might just recommend getting it done by a professional. I've been colouring hair for a while, but I've had greater results from BTZ Colour Jamz in terms of pigmentation and overall quality. Don't bother with this temporary, it sticks around so long you'd be better off using permanent dye - it would look a whole lot better.

product_title: 2 Pack – Premium 10% Sulfur Soap Cleansing Bar
review_body:
A household member contracted scabies for an unknown source. We were prescribed 5% cream by our pediatrician, yet there was a lingering fear the cream wasn't good enough. Which is why I made this purchase, for reassurance.
Does it work?
The validity is debatable because we used multiple methods at once. However, I can say, the soap feels like any neutral soap bar would, produces a strong odor, just like the instructions suggest and the company shipped it to us in the suggested time frame.
Overall, I'd like to believe the 2-pack of soap bars aided in ridding us of scabies in under a week.

product_title: Oil of Olay Gloss Wear Lip Shine Bronze Goddess Qty of 2
review_body:
I finally found this product again after holding on to a single pot for what has to be about 15 years. I bought the sheer sunlight shade in a convenience drug store that long ago, and fell in love with it. After awhile I saw it was discontinued and I was disappointed. I really love this gloss. Now I found this shade and several others on ebay. I'm not sure if they are being manufactured again since they are available here on amazon.com but hopefully they have come back to stay.

Quite a few people think that the product gets wasted because it's too thick and you have to put a lot on to get color. They also say that it's way too sticky. Well let me tell you something. If you put this product on with a brush it comes out even and beautiful and you do NOT have to glop it on. Second, I love the fact that it is really sticky because my lips feel nourished when I slather it on and the shine is second to NONE. I really mean it. Put on any other gloss that is being manufactured today and you will never get the shine that you get from this stuff. When they named it Lip Shine they really meant it. When I found these colors again, I tossed all my other glosses and now only have these. Tip: They look great with a complimentary lipliner shade. Awesome!!

A little pot goes a long long way!

product_title: Hair Catch Cape Icc-40 Blue (Japan Import)
review_body: Easy enough to get it to hold shape if you use your brain. Just roll it the opposite way that it comes rolled and hold it for a bit. product_title: Schick Hydro Silk Razor for Women
review_headline: Performs similarly to the Gillette Venus Embrace razor.
review_body:
When I received the Schick Hydro Silk Sensitive Razor for review, I had been using the Venus Embrace by Gillette for at least 4 years. For a week or two, I used both in tandem for underarm shaving to see if I could distinguish the difference, using the Embrace on the left and the Hydro Silk on the right.

The Hydro Silk was brand new and the razor head on my Venus Embrace already had wear on it. As a result, I expected the Schick razor to outperform the Gillette razor. Au contraire! It was a pretty even race. I kept having stubble on the right, so after the first week or two, I swapped and used the Embrace on the right and the Hydro Silk on the left. I'm very glad I did this, because I would have given the Hydro Silk a lower rating if I hadn't. What I found was that apparently the angle at which I shave my right is different than the way I shave my left. So, while I can get a perfectly smooth armpit on the left, I find it challenging on the right to completely remove all stubble. So my stubbly right armpit was NOT the fault of the razor, as it turns out, but simply a matter of my holding the razor differently.

Speaking of holding the razor, while I still prefer my Venus Embrace overall, I preferred the longer/larger grip area on the Hydro Silk's handle to the shorter/smaller grip area on the Venus Embrace.

As for the replaceable shave head, this is where Hydro Silk lost its 5th star. The shaving surface of my Venus Embrace shave head, which has a LOT more wear on it than the Hydro Silk, is still very smooth. Sure, it's lost a bit of its lubricating strip, but there is nothing rough or hard on the shave head. After only 4 weeks of use (and most of it part-time), the white strips at the top and bottom of the shave head are nearly gone, and what remains are what appear to be hard, white bumps of plastic, some of which stick up off the razor head by 1/8".

Both razors have 5 blades and, if you buy the kit that comes with the razor, 2 shave heads and a suction cup hanger for the shower, both cost about 10 bucks here on Amazon.

In summary, while the Schick Hydro Silk performs about as well as the Venus Embrace, it will end up being more expensive in the long run because elements of the shave head wear down more quickly. For my money, I'll stick with the Venus Embrace.

4 starsrazor, 2 shave heads and a suction cup hanger for the shower, both cost about 10 bucks here on Amazon.

product_title: Guerlain Mitsouko Edp Spray
review_headline: Finally, I'm Old Enough For Mitsuko
review_body: When I was a child, my mother had a great friend who was an elderly White Russian aristocrat, a woman of great elegance and taste who'd lived in China, and had a house full of remarkable, rich furniture and impossibly deep wool carpets. This was her signature scent. I'd always been in thrall of it, but it seemed too complex for my palate - I tended as a younger woman toward simpler scents, white florals etc. But the memory of this perfume, with its difficult to define allure and multiple levels of scent, stayed with me and finally, FINALLY, I broke down and tried it. I hated it on me when I used it the first time - but tried it again the next day. By day three I was hooked. It starts out almost green, like a broken twig, but the drydown has multiple layers and the whole scent changes interestingly through the day. Very difficult for me to identify the individual notes, but if you like a complex, very adult scent that whispers of the Orient, this is one to try.

The glue was very poor and bad choice for the application. I used a small drop of hot glue for replacing these disk covers on each header. They shave great without any problems for now.

product_title: Philips Norelco 6948XL/41 Shaver 2100 (Packaging may vary)
review_body: This razor gives me a close shave and the trimmer does a good job of keeping my beard looking well groomed. I don't think you can beat it considering it's reasonable cost.

product_title: Onei Heat Shield Flat Iron Travel Pouch (Flat Iron Case Fits Most Full-Size Hair Straighteners)

product_title: Healing Strength Neem Plant Silk Serum by L'anza, 3.4 Ounce
review_body: My hair frizzes easily. This helps control that and bring out my natural wave. I mix a squirt of this with mousse and smooth through my wet hair.

product_title: Oral-B Indicator Flat Trim Toothbrush, Value Pack, 2 Count (Pack of 6)
review_headline: Exactly what I was looking for
review_body:
I was specifically looking for a toothbrush with a smaller head than what they sell in stores.
This Toothbrush is exactly that. It has 30 Tufts of bristles which make it a lot smaller than the same model they sell in stores. If you have a smaller mouth that needs a smaller toothbrush to get into the hard to reach places. And you don't want to buy dora the explorer this toothbrush is your answer!

Also, they take forever to put in and out so it's not really worth the time. I haven't tried them with my hair straighten. The quality of them are nice. Seller got them to me quickly.

product_title: Jaqua Buttercream Frosting Shea Body Butter, 6 oz
review_body: I am satisfied with this product  in general,use it only for my hands.ithought it smelled a little strong to begin with.My husband loves the smell and it does keep my hands well moisturized and not greasy!

product_title: HSI Professional Glider | Ceramic Tourmaline Ionic Flat Iron Hair Straightener | Straightens & Curls with Adjustable Temp | Incl Glove, Pouch, & Travel Size Argan Oil Hair Treatment | Packaging Varies
review_body: I have only had the HSI for a few weeks but I am very pleased with it so far.  I find the heat glove isn't necessary, and it curls my hair much easier than my 8 year old Paul Mitchell straightener.  The carrying case is a nice plus too.

product_title: Farouk Chi PM7723 Pink Lace Limited Edition Ceramic Hairstyling Iron with Free Handbag and 2 Ounce Chi Iron Guard
review_body: I am a chi fan. They always have great flat irons. Although I was purchasing this item only for the flat iron, it did not come with the chi protective spray it said came with the set. But all in all it works great, heats up very fast and makes my hair look smooth. Took forever to ship though! A week to ship and another week to arrive.

review_body: It doesn't look realistic, its very thin, so Id suggest 2, and the black is more of a dark grey, I was a tad let down, but for the price its what you'd expect.

To me it seem much less streaky than the first wave. Two coats was all it took to get perfect opaque coverage. This has a really cool bumpy orange peel effect. Overall I really like this polish."

product_title: SilcSkin Anti-Wrinkle Pads
review_body: I buy these every month or two and sleep with it on all night, it truly is a miracle. Does lose its stickiness after time but still worth it.  Or you can just use it in the morning to fix the wrinkles instead of preventing them, they plump right out. Was amazed the first morning!
